metas.name: The Price is Right
metas.description: The Price is Right, originally hosted by Bob Barker until 2007 and Drew Carey thereafter -- features a wide variety of games and contests with the same basic challenge: Guess the prices of everyday (or not-quite-everyday) retail items. Four contestants, all of whom are seated in one of the wildest audiences in daytime game-show history, are called to the stage to play a preliminary pricing round. That winner joins the host on stage for one of more than 70 different pricing games. After three such games, the contestants spin a big wheel -- hoping to get as close to $1 as possible -- in the "Showcase Showdown". The two highest winners of that round advance to the final, where prizes could be cars or roomsful of furniture. A trio of models presents the prizes.

metas.name: Fast Money Halftime Report
metas.description: The hot trades in the market from the floor of the New York Stock Exchange.

metas.name: The Young and the Restless
metas.description: The Young and the Restless revolves around the rivalries, romances, hopes and fears of the residents of the fictional Midwestern metropolis, Genoa City. The lives and loves of a wide variety of characters mingle through the generations, dominated by the Newman, Abbott, Chancellor, Baldwin and Winters families. ­ When The Young and the Restless premiered in 1973, it revolutionized the daytime drama. It continues to set the standard with strong characters, socially conscious storylines, romance and sensuality.

videos.title: Ep. #13287
videos.overview: Victor and Nikki receive unsettling news. Phyllis interrogates Daniel. Nick plan for Matt Clark takes a dangerous turn.

videos.title: Ep. #13288
videos.overview: Nikki conspires with Michael. Lily sends Cane mixed signals. Diane loses patience about Jack's loyalty to Nikki.

videos.title: Ep. #13289
videos.overview: Kyle helps Jack get leverage against Victor. Phyllis and Cane switch gears. Audra and Holden agree to a fresh start.

videos.title: Ep. #13290
videos.overview: Jack presents Victor with a shocking offer. Nick suffers a set back. Phyllis encourages Cane to visit his dark side.

videos.title: Ep. #13291
videos.overview: Victor double crosses Jack. Cane surprises Phyllis. Nikki confronts an enemy.

videos.title: Ep. #13292
videos.overview: Victor backs Cane into a corner. Victoria and Adam do damage control at Newman. Sally gives Billy an ultimatum.

videos.title: Ep. #13293
videos.overview: Victor and Nikki argue about family business. Nick takes matters into his own hands. Sharon helps Tessa make a tough decision.

videos.title: Ep. #13294
videos.overview: Sally forces Billy to come clean. Phyllis defends her actions. Nick keeps a secret from Sharon.

metas.name: The Bold and the Beautiful
metas.description: They created a dynasty where passion rules, they are the Forresters, the first name in Fashion. The Bold and the Beautiful, a world of fashion, glamor and romance. A place where power, money and success are there for the taking in a city where dreams really do come true. Follow the lives and loves of the Forresters on The Bold and the Beautiful...

videos.title: Ep. #9687
videos.overview: Daphne makes a revelation. Taylor worries when Sheila shows up unannounced. Deke and Katie realize they are kindred spirits.

videos.title: Ep. #9688
videos.overview: Li gets summoned by Sheila. Carter and Ridge are blindsided by Steffy's news.

videos.title: Ep. #9689
videos.overview: Daphne attempts to let Carter down. Deacon makes an admission to Deke. Steffy confronts Taylor about what she witnessed.

videos.title: Ep. #9690
videos.overview: Sheila confronts Deke after eavesdropping on him and Deacon. Daphne and Carter talk through their relationship. A possibility of a kiss lingers.

videos.title: Ep. #9691
videos.overview: Steffy and Finn grow concerned that Sheila will resort to violence upon finding out about Deacon and Taylor.

videos.title: Ep. #9692
videos.overview: Ridge, Steffy, Carter and Daphne all celebrate the newly engaged couple.

metas.name: Beyond the Gates
metas.description: Beyond the Gates is set in a leafy Maryland suburb just outside of Washington D.C., and in one the most affluent African American counties in the United States. Here you'll find a posh gated community with winding tree-lined streets and luxurious mansions to call home. At the center of this community are the Duprees, a powerful and prestigious multi-generational family that is the very definition of Black royalty. But behind these pristine walls and lush, manicured gardens are juicy secrets and scandals waiting to be uncovered. And those that live outside these gates are watching closely. These are the places where our characters live, love, work and play. Those who have "made it" and those who haven't are all trying to navigate life … and some with more grace than others.

videos.title: Episode 203
videos.overview: Anita gets a surprise visit from an old friend that turns tense; after learning some devastating news, Vanessa has a request for Joey; Eva and Izaiah inch closer; Tyrell and Jessica hit a relationship hurdle.

videos.title: Episode 204
videos.overview: Joey has a proposition for Leslie that comes with a catch; Shanice makes a juicy admission to Ashley; Vernon doles out some sage advice to Dani; Samantha feels guilty as Nicole clashes with Tyrell over an upcoming family event.

videos.title: Episode 205
videos.overview: Anita sets a mystery plan into motion that involves her entire family; Chelsea and Kat clash; Andre distracts Dani; Carlton comforts Nicole; Naomi leans on a friend; Martin and Smitty try to understand what's going on with their son;

videos.title: Episode 206
videos.overview: Anita begins medical treatment; Dani and Nicole get their test results; Jacob and Andre worry about their wives; Martin delivers bad news to Vernon.

videos.title: Episode 207
videos.overview: Nicole comforts Dani during a crisis; Andre draws a line in the sand; Chelsea sends an SOS call to Bill; Naomi needs an urgent favor from a friend; Ted and Carlton have a long overdue chat.

videos.title: Episode 208
videos.overview: Anita returns home from chemo and learns Vernon's been lying to her; the Duprees rally around one of their own while Nicole spirals; Jacob and Elon have a heart to heart; Ashley goes on a date with a co-worker.

videos.title: Episode 209
videos.overview: Joey consults with Bill on a legal matter; Hayley continues to enact her deadly plan; Leslie's romantic interlude takes a dangerous turn; Vanessa shows up for a friend in need; Pamela bolsters her bestie.

videos.title: Episode 210
videos.overview: Dani and Hayley clash; Ted has a request of Eva, which then puts her at odds with Kat once again; Anita reaches her limit; Jessica has a proposition for Tyrell; Ashley has an update for Naomi and Shanice.

metas.name: General Hospital
metas.description: General Hospital, which celebrated its golden anniversary on April 1, 2013, continues its tradition of passion, intrigue and adventure that takes place in the fictional town of Port Charles in upstate New York. The glamour and excitement of those who have come to find their destinies in this familiar seaport town intertwine with the lives, loves and fortunes of beloved, well-known faces. As always, love, danger and mind blowing plot twists continue to abound on General Hospital with contemporary storylines and unforgettable characters.

videos.title: Ep. #15869
videos.overview: Michael takes the stand; Elizabeth testifies; Carly and Valentin fashion a new plan; Lulu and Nathan worry; Tracy makes a vow.

videos.title: Ep. #15870
videos.overview: Lulu comforts Dante; Laura is relieved; Tracy comes to a shocking conclusion; Nathan and Molly compare notes; Michael is taken aback.

videos.title: Ep. #15871
videos.overview: Trina and Kai make a huge realization about who shot Drew; Drew loses his cool; Alexis makes a risky legal move; Brook Lynn reconnects with Sonny; Dante makes an admission.

videos.title: Ep. #15872
videos.overview: Tracy confronts Alexis; Jason and Carly encounter with Drew; Britt makes a slip of the tongue; Trina and Kai weigh their options; Laura confers with Sonny.

videos.title: Ep. #15873
videos.overview: Alexis is floored; Martin relays news to Drew; Molly confides in Kristina; Michael and Jacinda grow closer; Nina is frustrated.

videos.title: Ep. #15874
videos.overview: Valentin takes a risk; Britt is threatened; Ava has a shocking encounter; Drew makes a promise; Carly is alarmed.

metas.name: Hell's Kitchen
metas.description: In Hell's Kitchen, aspiring chefs are put through an intense culinary academy to prove they possess the right combination of ingredients to win a life-changing grand prize.

videos.title: Queens of the Kitchen
videos.overview: The chefs must make aesthetically pleasing dishes for Gordon Ramsay's social media followers.

videos.title: Who's the Boss
videos.overview: The final four chefs are given 10 minutes and $25 to grocery shop for their first challenge's dish.

videos.title: Hell of a Showdown
videos.overview: Chef Ramsay surprises the three finalists with a special visit with their families; the finalists are pampered with a day of hair, makeup and styling before they are faced with a major surprise challenge; only two chefs advance to the season finale.

metas.description: 9-1-1 is a fast-paced exploration into the lives and careers of first responders – cops, paramedics, firefighters – the people who put their lives on the line to save others.

videos.title: Secrets
videos.overview: Hen's attempts at keeping her mysterious health issues private are starting to impact more than just her physical well-being. Meanwhile, Buck and Ravi decide Eddie needs a night out on the town.

metas.name: This Old House
metas.description: The mission of This Old House is to demystify the home improvement process and to celebrate the fusion of old world craftsmanship and modern technology. Each season features two renovation projects. Project One traditionally consists of eighteen or so episodes and is filmed in Massachusetts. Project Two is generally taped in a different region of the country to highlight the variety of American architectural styles and renovation issues.

metas.name: Law & Order
metas.description: In the criminal justice system, the people are represented by two separate, yet equally important, groups: the police, who investigate crime; and the district attorneys, who prosecute the offenders. These are their stories.

videos.title: Snowflakes
videos.overview: An injured woman's sudden disappearance from the hospital leads to a murder investigation; as an eyewitness to the crime, Brady partners with Benson's SVU to unravel a complex motive; an explosive discovery puts both squads in danger.

videos.title: Dream On
videos.overview: Brady's son becomes a prime suspect in a murder investigation, putting a target on her back; Price must prove the defendant's alibi is bogus to make his case.

metas.name: The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills
metas.description: The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills offers a glimpse inside the world of luxurious wealth and pampered privilege, where being seen and who you know is everything. These women are in the center of it all and they have the mansions, the cars, and the diamonds to prove it. From heiresses to entrepreneurs to a family of child actresses - they deliver the star power and the drama.

videos.title: A Housewives Heatwave
videos.overview: Sutton plans a trip to Sedona, where she hopes to show the group how much she's changed. Rachel opens up about life as a boy mom. Kathy hosts a summertime dinner where Amanda talks her way into the hot seat. Dorit looks to Kyle for support while navigating her separation, but both women decide there's a better man for the job. Boz takes another shot at her fertility journey. Erika reveals she has a new love interest.

videos.title: Not Feeling The Healing
videos.overview: The ladies try to tap into the healing energy of Sedona, but Kyle & Dorit's friendship remains on the rocks. Bozoma and Rachel struggle with the desert heat while others embrace the elements on a hike to the vortex. Amanda shares information about Sutton's former assistant and discovers it's not just the heat in Sedona that's unforgiving. Jennifer Tilly turns to Kyle after a tense moment with Sutton.

metas.name: Ask This Old House
metas.description: The crew at This Old House take on some pretty big projects, which means they can only work on one or two houses a year. But homeowners have a virtual truckload of questions on smaller projects, and the TOH crew is ready to answer. Ask This Old House solves the steady stream of home improvement problems faced by viewers - and the crew even makes house calls!

metas.name: The Traitors
metas.description: Set in a remote castle in the Scottish Highlands and based on the wildly popular Dutch series of the same name, 5-time Emmy-nominated Alan Cumming plays host to twenty larger-than-life personalities (including reality A-listers and America's best game players) who come together to complete a series of challenges with the objective of earning a cash prize of up to $250,000. The catch? Three of the contestants coined "the traitors" will devise a plan to steal the prize from the other contestants coined "the faithful".

videos.title: Let the Cards Fall As They Will
videos.overview: Another new all-star cast arrives in Scotland under the cover of darkness for the ultimate game of deception and the chance to win up to $250k; the cards of fate are dealt, secrets lurk in the shadows and the game starts faster than ever before.

videos.title: The Death Conga
videos.overview: Secrets surround the castle; the first Faithful is murdered, the mission causes friction and some overwhelming evidence is brought to the round table; the pressure is on as the Traitors must commit their next murder right under the Faithful's noses.

videos.title: Show Me Your Faces
videos.overview: The Faithful are given an early chance to avenge the Traitors' latest murder; the stakes are higher than ever in the mission, as the players must put their lives in the hands of the person they trust the most; a brutal end awaits one Faithful.

videos.title: Cut the Head off the Snake
videos.overview: A fiery mission results in several players up for murder; one player has some damning evidence, while another reveals their suspicions to the wrong person; there's a big swing at the round table and the Traitors feel the weight of their decisions.

metas.name: 9-1-1: Nashville
metas.description: A high-octane procedural about heroic first responders, as well as their family saga of power and glamour set in one of America's most diverse and dynamic cities.

videos.title: You've Been Boarded
videos.overview: Nashville is under siege, with each missed ransom escalating the stakes; as the city descends into chaos, Don grows desperate after losing contact with Blythe and races to find her before it's too late.

videos.title: All Hands
videos.overview: Time is running out as ransom demands and medical emergencies escalate in Nashville, then a power outage triggered by the hackers wreaks havoc at the hospital.

metas.name: Beat Bobby Flay
metas.description: In order to Beat Bobby Flay, you have to get to him first. This new series is the ultimate throwdown-showdown... . Three culinary masters, each with their own signature dish, a dish that they'd stake their reputations on, travel to New York for the chance to challenge Bobby Flay to a head-to-head cook-off of their specialty. But first, these contenders must battle it out to see who has the culinary prowess to ultimately go one-on-one against Bobby on his own turf.

videos.title: Attack of the Titans
videos.overview: Bobby Flay's Triple Threat Titans Michael Voltaggio and Brooke Williamson team up with heavy hitter chefs Adriana Urbina and Marcel Vigneron to conquer Bobby.

metas.name: Ancient Aliens
metas.description: Ancient Aliens explores the controversial theory that extraterrestrials have visited Earth for millions of years. From the age of the dinosaurs to ancient Egypt, from early cave drawings to continued mass sightings in the US, each episode in this hit History series gives historic depth to the questions, speculations, provocative controversies, first-hand accounts and grounded theories surrounding this age old debate. Did intelligent beings from outer space visit Earth thousands of years ago?

metas.name: Homicide Squad New Orleans
metas.description: To safeguard their streets, the New Orleans Police Department boasts a dedicated team of homicide detectives, many of whom are natives of the legendary city. "Homicide Squad New Orleans" chronicles the harrowing work of this committed group of men and women united against the odds to protect their city and home. In each episode, the team will be faced with a new case and tasked with putting together the evidence to catch the perpetrator, find answers for the victims loved ones, and keep their community safe.

metas.name: Law & Order: Special Victims Unit
metas.description: In the criminal justice system, sexually-based offenses are considered especially heinous. In New York City, the dedicated detectives who investigate these vicious felonies are members of an elite squad known as the Special Victims Unit. These are their stories.

videos.title: Purity
videos.overview: The hunt for a murder suspect uncovers a crime with shocking legal and ethical implications; Bruno must protect his squad during a raid on a suspect's home; Carisi and Price team up in court when Brady's interrogation tactics undermine the case.

videos.title: Fidelis Ad Mortem
videos.overview: When Curry's son finds a disturbing cassette tape in a thrift store haul, she and Benson must investigate a decades-old missing persons case; Griffin learns a disturbing rumor about his father.

metas.name: The Valley: Persian Style
metas.description: This series follows a tight-knit group of Persian friends who have traded Beverly Hills for suburban life in the Valley. Rooted in their culture that values family, friendships and loyalty above everything else, emotions often take over as these fiery personalities navigate their highs, lows and everything in between.

videos.title: Valley Days and Persian Nights
videos.overview: Old friends Reza, Mercedeh and Golnesa have traded Beverly Hills for suburban life in the Valley. Their new social circle features family matters, strong personalities and the ever-present prospect of clashes. While the couples in the group seem happy, cracks in their relationships emerge. Financial speculation about Golnesa spreads through the group and comes to a head at Persian Night.

videos.title: Darth Vida
videos.overview: On date night, Tommy's coarse ways leave a bad taste in Mercedeh's mouth. Ladies' man Reza Jackson endures a disastrous date of his own. Sky puts Tanin's skincare oil to unexpected use. Reza confronts Golnesa about her financial situation. Sky and Bamshad struggle with their sleeping arrangement. Marital woes for Greg and Tanin, as well as Tommy and Mercedeh, leave them questioning how to move forward.

videos.title: Bartender Blues
videos.overview: Mercedeh's unhappiness with Tommy grows as their communication breaks down. Adam pledges more affection to Reza. As rumors of Greg's online flirtations spread, he surprises Tanin with a special gift.

metas.name: Animal Control
metas.description: Animal Control is a workplace comedy following a group of Animal Control workers whose lives are complicated by the fact that animals are simple, but humans are not.

videos.title: Bagged Birds and Alley Dogs
videos.overview: Frank spends the day with influencer and park benefactor Roman Park ahead of the grand opening of their annex kennel. Friction arises within the newly combined precincts when Emily assigns Templeton, Shred and Patel to work together, while pairing Victoria with Daisy. Meanwhile, Emily and Shred find themselves in peculiar situations.

metas.name: Going Dutch
metas.description: In Going Dutch a decorated, hard-ass colonel is tasked with running the least important U.S. Army base in the world, located in the tulip-hugging, wine-chugging Netherlands.

videos.title: The Laser's Edge
videos.overview: An intense battle of laser tag combat; Captain Maggie avoids third-wheeling Major Shah and Celeste.

metas.name: The Hunting Party
metas.description: When a secret prison suffers a mysterious explosion that allows the nation's most violent serial killers to escape, a former profiler is thrust back into a thrilling game of cat and mouse. Alongside a team of soldiers, spies and special agents, she has no choice but to track down and recapture these dangerous criminals… before they kill again.

videos.title: Ron Simms
videos.overview: Bex Henderson must fight to have the Hunting Party team reinstated so that they can catch the infamous "Boogeyman" killer, Ron Simms, who is currently at large and targeting women who are searching for love.

videos.title: Adrian Gallo
videos.overview: The team must hunt down Adrian Gallo, a serial killer who preserved his victims in acrylic resin; with such a complicated and dangerous escapee on the loose, Bex works alongside a detective from Adrian's past.

metas.name: Grey's Anatomy
metas.description: The doctors of Grey Sloan Memorial Hospital deal with life-or-death consequences on a daily basis -- it's in one another that they find comfort, friendship and, at times, more than friendship. Together they're discovering that neither medicine nor relationships can be defined in black and white. Real life only comes in shades of grey.

videos.title: Skyfall
videos.overview: Winston and Ben fight to save Jo's life; Teddy supports Link; Owen and Jules battle to save a young man; Lucas forms an unexpected bond with a patient.

metas.name: Crime in Progress
metas.description: The story of each crime is woven together through raw, unfiltered video from the point of view of officer body cam and surveillance footage for a first-hand look at justice in action.

metas.name: Impractical Jokers
metas.description: Four longtime friends take dares to outrageous new levels in truTV's hilarious series Impractical Jokers. Q, Murr, Joe and Sal bravely face some of the most unbelievably awkward and brazen hijinks yet, daring each other with over-the-top challenges that are guaranteed to set a new side-splitting standard.

videos.title: Haunting of the Joker House
videos.overview: The Jokers' mothers visit as overprotective parents meeting a Joker's girlfriend.

metas.name: Impractical Jokers: Inside Jokes
metas.description: Impractical Jokers: Inside Jokes packs classic, fan-favorite episodes of the show with sharable pop-up facts throughout. With behind-the-scenes stories and surprising factoids directly from the Jokers, this alternate version of existing content will give viewers a unique and unprecedented look behind the curtain.

metas.name: EastEnders
metas.description: Set in the East End of London, the show focuses on the tensions between love and family with stories ranging from hard-hitting social issues, to personal, human tragedies. And there's plenty of funny moments too. Classic characters old and new across thousands of episodes have shared a drink in The Queen Vic, shed tears of despair or joy, sat on Arthur's bench in the Square... and at some point or other they probably crossed paths with Ian Beale.

videos.overview: Nicola has a plan for revenge, Alfie tries to handle a difficult situation, and Phil makes a big decision about the future.
Ravi is thrown into a dangerous situation, Linda attends her school reunion, and Penny realises Gina knows her secret.
Priya, Vinny and Nugget search for Ravi, Linda hears some home truths about her past behaviour, and Honey's mistake leads to an opportunity.
Ravi comes to a shocking realisation, Max gets a new fan, and Linda runs round after Bea.
The police continue their investigation into an attack, Oscar and Lauren plan a memorial for Abi, and Penny is concerned for a friend.
Nicola gets a nasty surprise, Honey offers a shoulder to cry on, and Gina gives romantic advice to Penny.
The Brannings gather to remember Abi, Priya tries to reassure a loved one, and Jack turns up the pressure.

metas.name: Piglets
metas.description: The government's stated policy of recruiting 20,000 new police officers in double quick time has not come at the cost of lowering standards. Or has it?  Set in a fictional police training college, Piglets is about a newly recruited group of six very different would-be cops and the handful of key staff whose thankless task it is to knock them into some kind of shape.

videos.title: Mispers
videos.overview: Return of the sitcom set in a charmingly dysfunctional police training college. Bob and Julie compete to go on a trip to the Bahamas with the Chief Superintendent.

videos.title: Cop Out
videos.overview: Geeta tries to back out when she is voted Year Rep against her will, and Bob and Julie get a shock when Cunningham plans to merge their superintendent positions.

metas.name: Emmerdale
metas.description: Emmerdale is a British soap focusing on the lives of several families and locals living around an estate, a farm and the nearby village in the Yorkshire Dales. It is the second longest British soap in television history since airing its first episode on ITV in 1972, as 'Emmerdale Farm', the show was renamed in 1989.

videos.title: Tuesday 6th January
videos.overview: There is complete carnage after the previous night's catastrophic events, with the local hospital busy and the revelations keep coming over what happened and why?

videos.title: Wednesday 7th January
videos.overview: A deal is struck and a mission is given out, while April stands her ground and Sarah has questions.

videos.title: Thursday 8th January
videos.overview: There is a betrayal, Paddy receives bad news and Moira is left in utter shock.

videos.title: Friday 9th January
videos.overview: Someone has to think on their feet, Paddy's news gets worse and a body lies undiscovered.

videos.title: Monday 12th January
videos.overview: A convoy of police vehicles head into the village and the officers want answers, while Ray's body is found.

videos.title: Wednesday 14th January
videos.overview: Evidence is found and an arrest is made, while Laurel is struggling and the search for Bear continues.

videos.title: Thursday 15th January
videos.overview: Paddy is feeling desperately sad, while Jai is left worried and Joe is behaving furtively.

metas.name: Coronation Street
metas.description: Step onto the cobbles for all the drama, secrets and unforgettable moments from the world's longest running TV soap.

videos.title: Tuesday 6th January
videos.overview: Weatherfield mourns the loss of one of its own as others try to get to the truth of exactly what happened on the treacherous road to cause such a devastating pile-up.

videos.title: Exit Interview: Daniel Brocklebank
videos.overview: As Billy says goodbye to the cobbles, we couldn't let Dan go without taking a look back at his time on the street.

videos.title: Wednesday 7th January
videos.overview: The aftermath of the crash continues to impact one couple as they face a life-or-death situation.

videos.title: Thursday 8th January
videos.overview: The police investigation progresses, with one resident finding themself under arrest and facing charges.

videos.title: Friday 9th January
videos.overview: With families at war and surprises emerging from the past, the aftermath of the crash sends further shockwaves through the street.

videos.title: Monday 12th January
videos.overview: Betsy confronts Becky over her threats, Ryan shows Debbie evidence of Carl's pilfering from the hotel account, and Daniel hands Will a detention.

videos.title: Wednesday 14th January
videos.overview: Ronnie and Kevin fear the consequences of Debbie's decision, the discovery of a pregnancy test kit leaves Megan with some explaining to do, and David introduces Jodie to the Platts.

videos.title: Thursday 15th January
videos.overview: Debbie enters her plea in court, Will vandalises Ken's car to torment Daniel, Todd wrestles with a weighty task, and Jodie spoils Shona by making her lunch.

metas.name: Paradise Hotel
metas.description: Norwegian girls and boys check in at the Paradise Hotel in Mexico, where Triana Iglesias is the hotel manager. The hotel has great views and a fantastic pool. Cameras with a full view of the idyllic site tells the story of what happens when the single boys and girls meet in the hot surroundings of the hotel. The task they have is basically simple: Find a partner or check out.

metas.name: The Upshaws
metas.description: The Upshaws centers on a working-class African American family in Indiana struggling to make it work and make it right without the blueprints to do it.

metas.name: Alle mot alle
metas.description: Who are the smartest celebrities that Norway has to offer? Norwegian celebs meet for a very hard and entertaining educational battle, led by Henriette Steenstrup and Jon Almaas.

videos.title: Ekstra stas og ekstra press
videos.overview: Kirsti Falch-Nilsen and Mari Garås Monsson start their all-stars season with awe against Jarle Bernhoft and Kari Slaatsveen.

videos.title: Når konkurranseinstinktet tar over
videos.overview: Harald Dobloug and Katarina Flatland are unsure of their own quiz level. Will they get good answers when the chess duo Torstein Bae and Heidi Røneid form the opposition?

videos.title: Når i tvil, tå i sort!
videos.overview: Early prestige duel between Einar and Jan Thomas and Jarle and Kari – who will stand out at the start of the tournament?

videos.title: Tenk at dette skjer!
videos.overview: Henrik Thodesen and Gunhild Dahlberg open the season against the married couple Harald Dobloug and Katarina Flatland. Strong wills to win meet in a duel!

videos.title: Hele regnbuens farger i bur
videos.overview: Torstein Bae and Heidi Røneid face Jarle Bernhoft and Kari Slaatsveen – two strong teams that refuse to give up without a fight!

metas.name: Star Trek: Starfleet Academy
metas.description: Star Trek: Starfleet Academy is set in the 32nd century, a time period in the far-future of the Star Trek franchise where Starfleet and the United Federation of Planets are recovering from a cataclysmic event, as depicted in Star Trek: Discovery. Introduces viewers to a young group of cadets who come together to pursue a common dream of hope and optimism. Under the watchful and demanding eyes of their instructors, they discover what it takes to become Starfleet officers as they navigate blossoming friendships, explosive rivalries, first loves and a new enemy that threatens both the Academy and the Federation itself.

videos.title: Kids These Days
videos.overview: After being on the run since age 6, 21-year-old Caleb, a brilliant street kid, is offered the chance of a lifetime: to join the first new Starfleet Academy class in San Francisco in over a century. There's just one problem – the person offering him the spot is newly-minted Chancellor Nahla Ake, the Starfleet captain who sentenced his mother to Federation prison 15 years ago…

videos.title: Beta Test
videos.overview: With the start of the new academic year, Caleb's unease about his future at Starfleet Academy persists. But when a delegation from a former Federation ally arrives and Caleb is tasked with showing their leader's daughter around campus, he must put his uncertainty aside to discover what life at the Academy is really about.

metas.name: Love Is Blind: Germany
metas.description: Love Is Blind: Germany - where singletons in Germany, Austria and Swiss who want to be loved for who they are, rather than what they look like, sign up for a less conventional approach to modern dating.

videos.title: Es ist Schicksal!
videos.overview: Fifteen women. Fifteen men. More than 200 speed dates just on the first day. Even with those numbers, one participant sees their options dwindling fast.

videos.title: Oh! Mein! Gott!
videos.overview: Feeling seen without being seen has a profound effect on the singles as they learn more about themselves and each other, leading to the first proposal.

videos.title: So ein Wasschlappen!
videos.overview: More proposals follow as insecurities slowly melt away. One single backs out of a promise and tries to make amends — only to make things worse.

videos.title: Er sieht mich nicht.
videos.overview: After the final face-to-face meetings, the newly engaged couples are off to Crete to see if their physical chemistry matches their emotional bonds.

videos.title: Vollgas gegen die Wand
videos.overview: The couples open up about things they have trouble saying to each other when they all meet for a seaside party — and one pair reaches a breaking point.

videos.title: Ich liebe dich
videos.overview: Reality sets in as the couples return to Germany and move in together. An unexpected bout of jealousy shakes the confidence of one couple.

videos.title: Angst oder Zuversicht?
videos.overview: Meeting families and friends brings the wedding day that much closer. As dress and suit fittings reveal doubts, one couple hits a make-or-break moment.

videos.title: Willkommen in unserer Familie!
videos.overview: The bachelor and bachelorette gatherings offer an opportunity for reflection. A long-awaited declaration of love sets the stage for the first wedding.

metas.name: Make Love, Fake Love
metas.description: A dream woman lives and dates potential dream men in a villa in Greece. But there's a catch: not everyone is single. Who is serious about her and who isn't?

metas.name: The Pitt
metas.description: The Pitt is a realistic examination of the challenges facing healthcare workers in today's America as seen through the lens of the frontline heroes working in a modern-day hospital in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. Each episode follows an hour of Dr. Robby's 15-hour shift as the chief attendant in Pittsburgh Trauma Medical Hospital's emergency room.

videos.title: 7:00 A.M.
videos.overview: On July 4th, Robby meets his replacement for his upcoming sabbatical, and a familiar face returns to the Pitt.

metas.name: Agatha Christie's Seven Dials
metas.description: England. 1925. At a lavish country house party, a practical joke appears to have gone horribly, murderously wrong. It will be up to the unlikeliest of sleuths — the fizzingly inquisitive Lady Eileen 'Bundle' Brent — to unravel a chilling plot that will change her life, cracking wide open the country house mystery.

metas.name: Love Through a Prism
metas.description: Love Through a Prism is centered on Lili Ichijoin, a Japanese exchange student who travels to England to enroll in the prestigious Saint Thomas Art Academy. Determined to become a painter, she arrives under pressure: her parents expect her to rise to the top of her class within six months or return home.Lili's drive intensifies when she encounters Kit Church, a gifted aristocratic student known for his talent and detachment. While Kit has devoted himself entirely to painting, Lili's sincerity and resilience begin to shift something in him. The two share little beyond their love for art, yet their relationship quickly becomes central to life at the academy.

metas.name: Ayrılık Sevdaya Dahil
metas.description: Kemal, the collector and overall stronghold of a loan shark family,  confronts scriptwriter and obligatory restaurant owner Afife for a debt. This confrontation plunges them into emotions they never anticipated; they soon realize that love and honor are nothing like what they once believed.

metas.name: Days of Our Lives
metas.description: Days of our Lives is set in the fictitious Midwestern town of Salem. The core families are the Bradys, the Hortons and the DiMeras, and the multi-layered storylines involve elements of romance, adventure, mystery, comedy and drama.Beginning on September 12, 2022, DAYS became exclusive to streaming on Peacock.

metas.name: Critical Role
metas.description: Voice actor Matthew Mercer leads a group of fellow voice actors on epic Dungeons & Dragons campaigns. These familiar voices bring the audience into the full experience of D&D, allowing imaginations to soar as the characters embark on adventures. This is Critical Role!

metas.name: Sanctuary: A Witch's Tale
metas.description: Based on the novel by V.V. James, Sanctuary: A Witch's Tale is set in a contemporary world where witchcraft is real. It takes place in the idyllic English town of Sanctuary, where for hundreds of years witches have lived peacefully, as valued members of society. Until now... At the heart of the story is Sarah Fenn, Sanctuary's resident witch, on whom the town relies to solve their problems when conventional remedies have failed. When local teen rugby star, Dan Whithall, dies tragically in an apparent accident, his death exposes a terrifying undercurrent of suspicion and fear towards Sarah and her teenage daughter, Harper. Mother of the dead boy, Abigail, once Sarah's closest friend, is wracked with grief, and to avenge her son's death, launches a modern-day witch-hunt to get "justice", no matter what the cost.

videos.title: Episode 3
videos.overview: Sarah and Maggie determine that Angela has the most to gain from the murder and agree that they need more evidence; a magical attack on Harper forces Sarah to betray Maggie; following the attack, Sarah rekindles her romance with Lachlan.

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: Lachlan is arrested for Pierre's murder; Sarah and Maggie fight to clear his name by revealing Ryan's magical death to Deveraux; Angela intensifies her campaign against witches; Harper, revealing her magic, unbinds Lachlan.

metas.name: Ponies
metas.description: Moscow, 1977. Two "PONIES" ("persons of no interest" in intelligence speak) work anonymously as secretaries in the American Embassy. That is until their husbands are killed under mysterious circumstances in the USSR, and the pair become CIA operatives. Bea is an over-educated, Russian-speaking child of Soviet immigrants. Her cohort, Twila, is a small-town girl who is as abrasive as she is fearless. Together, they work to uncover a vast Cold War conspiracy and solve the mystery that made them widows in the first place.

videos.title: Second Hand News
videos.overview: After their lives are upended by tragedy in late 1970s Moscow, two CIA wives are thrust into a shadowy new world as they begin their journey as undercover operatives in the Soviet Union.

videos.title: Hanging On The Telephone
videos.overview: Bea and Twila begin their official training. Bea becomes a handler for a Soviet technician named Sasha and attracts the attention of a dangerous KGB officer, Andrei. Meanwhile, Twila's assignment to entertain a businessman leads her to uncover a much deeper conspiracy.

videos.title: Backstreets
videos.overview: Bea strengthens her cover on a date with Andrei; Twila dives into an off-the-books investigation of‬ ‭a string of sex worker murders.

videos.title: Don't Go Breaking My Heart
videos.overview: Twila runs her first asset, a Russian fixer named Vera who holds secrets regarding the deaths of their husbands. As Bea's bond with her asset Sasha grows, she faces increasing danger.

videos.title: Turn The Beat Around
videos.overview: In a bold and risky move, Bea enlists an unlikely ally to pose as Vera. However, what initially seems like a victory for the mission may actually be a trap set by their adversaries.

videos.title: Night Moves
videos.overview: As dark truths about her late husband surface, Bea struggles to maintain her cover with the dangerous KGB officer Andrei. Meanwhile, Twila goes undercover at a local hotel to gather further intelligence.

videos.title: Livin' Thing
videos.overview: A high-stakes stakeout across Moscow pushes both Bea and Twila to their physical and emotional limits. Their investigation finally reveals a devastating truth: there is a mole operating inside the American Embassy.

videos.title: The Stranger
videos.overview: In the season finale, Manya reunites with an old friend and makes a shocking discovery. As the danger peaks, Bea, Twila, and Sasha are forced to flee the city, finally uncovering the secret behind Andrei's swift rise within the KGB.

metas.name: Second Chance Love
metas.description: In Second Chance Love, five pairs of first loves reunite for a two-week journey filled with nostalgia, emotional reflection, and intimate dates. Led by our hosts, they revisit their pasts, confront unfinished business, and rediscover what once brought them together. As they build new memories and lean on each other for support, one big question remains: will they rekindle the spark they once had or discover that love belongs in the past? Told only in the way Hallmark can, with heartfelt emotion, authentic connection, and just a touch of magic, this new, original  series is a celebration of second chances and the enduring power of love.

videos.title: Recipe for Love
videos.overview: Things get cooking in pasta-making class, and vulnerability flows on solo dates.

videos.title: Hearts in Motion
videos.overview: After some exciting island adventures, the guys and girls hold heart to hearts.

metas.name: Canada's Drag Race
metas.description: Competing for the title of Canada's Next Drag Superstar, and a $100,000 grand prize, Canada's Drag Race tracks Canadian drag artists as they vie for the title of "Canada's Next Drag Superstar." Each episode tests their limits by having them compete in singing, dancing, acting, impersonation, design, and improvisation challenges. Competitors are eliminated until one queen is left standing with the crown, scepter, and coveted title. Throughout their journey to the crown, the queens showcase the importance of celebrating everyone's Charisma, Uniqueness, Nerve, and Talent.

videos.title: Charisma, Uniqueness, Nerve, and Talent
videos.overview: The queens have to earn their spot in the finale as they navigate a series of challenges. Guest judge is Allison Russell.

metas.name: Ireland: AM
metas.description: Magazine programme featuring health, safety and education reports, entertainment news and interviews with personalities making the headlines.

metas.name: Hard Quiz
metas.description: Host Tom Gleeson sets out to find Australia's hardest quiz champion, pitting four contestants against each other in a battle of attrition.

videos.title: Quebec, Bringing Up Baby, Daft Punk, Rick and Morty
videos.overview: Tom Gleeson awards the Big Brass Mug to whichever expert best answers his Hard Quiz questions on their expert topic: Quebec, classic comedy film Bringing Up Baby, electronic duo Daft Punk, and Rick & Morty

videos.title: The French Horn, Franklin's Lost Expedition, Kookaburras, American Psycho
videos.overview: Four know-it-alls try to get their hands on Tom Gleeson's Big Brass Mug, but which eclectic topic will win the day: the French horn, Franklin's lost expedition, kookaburras, or the film American Psycho?

metas.name: Morning Live
metas.description: A lively and entertaining mix of topical content and expert advice.

videos.title: Episode 140
videos.overview: Gethin Jones and Helen Skelton are joined by Paddy McGuinness to chat about the new series of Inside the Factory. Finance expert Iona Bain looks at rising energy bills and the support available, while Dr Xand explains how to spot glaucoma early. Richie Anderson shares home-hunting advice, investigative journalist Amber Haque discusses her documentary on Friends star Matthew Perry, and Coinneach MacLeod bakes a winter mincemeat cake.

videos.title: Episode 141
videos.overview: Helen Skelton and Rav Wilding are joined by actor Mark Williams to discuss the return of Father Brown. Finance expert Laura Pomfret shares advice on tackling debt, DIY SOS's Nick Knowles reveals simple home improvements to save money and Dr Oscar examines the health headlines for 2026. Also, Holly Hamilton answers your consumer questions and Olympic champion Greg Rutherford leads Strictly Fitness.

videos.title: Episode 142
videos.overview: Gethin Jones and Gaby Roslin are joined by former detective Rav Wilding for the latest crime updates. Also, consumer journalist Rebecca Wilcox explains HMRC's move to digital, Briony May Williams meets the NHS Chef of the Year, vet Dr James Greenwood answers whether pets get colds and former Traitors join us to analyse the new series.

videos.title: Episode 143
videos.overview: Gethin Jones and Michelle Ackerley are joined by Dr Punam, who shares her cancer diagnosis. Journalist Gordon Smart explains how to spot fake AI news, former detective Rav Wilding warns about holiday scams, lawyer Gary Rycroft breaks down the legal headlines, and therapist Anna Williamson offers advice on dating in later life. Plus Dawn French discusses her new BBC comedy.

videos.title: Episode 144
videos.overview: Gethin Jones and Helen Skelton investigate the dangers of illegal tobacco with former detective sergeant Marc Cananur. Scam Interceptors' Nick Stapleton exposes scams exploiting sick children, while former police inspector Anton Sullivan explains cancelled speeding fines. Dr Xand tackles the winter sickness bug, Louise Minchin reveals the best and worst energy suppliers, and Strictly stars Jimmy Floyd Hasselbaink and Lauren Oakley join us.

videos.title: Episode 146
videos.overview: Gethin Jones and Louise Minchin speak to former detective Rav Wilding about secondhand-car scams. Journalist Harry Kind explains how to avoid rogue locksmiths, cost-of-living correspondent Colletta Smith discusses heat pumps and Dr Oscar examines the health headlines. Banjo and Ro discuss their island renovation project series, and there's Gladiators Fitness with Apollo.

metas.name: Rip Off Britain
metas.description: The Rip Off Britain team is ready to tackle the issues that most matter to you - from bills and bad customer service, to holidays and food.

videos.title: The banned online pet store still taking your money
videos.overview: The team sniffs out the truth about the glossy online pet store selling treats for dogs, which despite been banned from trading is still taking pet owners' money.

videos.title: I'm blind - but my bank sends letters I can't read
videos.overview: The team reveal shocking failings at a high street bank after it sent crucial communications to a blind customer by letter.

videos.title: Roof repair rogues took aim at our homes
videos.overview: The team visit a Portsmouth suburb that has been repeatedly targeted by doorstep cold callers trying to charge thousands of pounds for roof repair jobs that simply weren't needed.

videos.title: Slimed by sludge pipe leak during our dream cruise
videos.overview: A couple from the Wirral say their dream cruise holiday was ruined when a leaky pipe above their cabin covered them in foul-smelling liquidised food waste.

videos.title: Elvis event left me all shook up
videos.overview: The team takes on the case of an Elvis superfan who says an immersive experience with the 'King' was far from what was advertised.

videos.title: Owed thousands by my energy company
videos.overview: The team investigate the case of the energy company that still refused to pay back £3,000 to its customer despite two ombudsman rulings in his favour.

videos.title: I won in court – but I'm still out of pocket
videos.overview: The team investigates why court rulings aren't being enforced against the businesses that owe their customers money – and what can be done about it.

videos.title: Next door up in flames - but I had to pay
videos.overview: The team investigate why an insurance company declined a no-fault claim after a fire spread from the house next door.

metas.name: Palm Royale
metas.description: In 1969, a woman attempts to cross that impermeable line between the haves and the have-nots and secure her seat at America's most exclusive table: Palm Beach high society.

videos.title: Maxine Hears a Confession
videos.overview: Amid a raging snowstorm in the Alps, Norma orchestrates plans to secure the fortune for herself and Robert. Maxine races to expose her.

videos.title: Maxine Does Something Good
videos.overview: Season finale. Maxine and Evelyn work to ensure the wedding isn't jeopardized—if Maxine's guilt doesn't get to her first.

metas.name: Fallout
metas.description: Based on one of the greatest video game series of all time, Fallout is the story of haves and have nots in a world in which there's almost nothing left to have. 200 years after the apocalypse, a peaceful denizen from a cozy fallout shelter is forced to return to the surface and is shocked to discover the wasteland waiting for her.

videos.title: The Demon in the Snow
videos.overview: Rock to spear and so on...

videos.title: The Wrangler
videos.overview: Big Whoop.

metas.name: Hijack
metas.description: Told in real time, Hijack is a tense thriller that follows the journey of a hijacked plane as it makes its way to London over a seven-hour flight, as authorities on the ground scramble for answers. Sam Nelson is an accomplished negotiator in the business world who needs to step up and use all his guile to try and save the lives of the passengers — but his high-risk strategy could be his undoing.

videos.title: Signal
videos.overview: Two years after Flight KA29's hijacking, Sam Nelson is thrust into another life-threatening ordeal—but this time it's personal.

metas.name: Percy Jackson and the Olympians
metas.description: 12-year-old modern demigod Percy Jackson has just come to terms with his newfound supernatural powers when the sky god Zeus accuses him of stealing his master lightning bolt. Now Percy must trek across America to find it and restore order to Olympus.

videos.title: Nobody Gets the Fleece
videos.overview: Percy and Annabeth go undercover on an island to rescue their friends.

videos.title: I Go Down with the Ship
videos.overview: With a friend in danger, our heroes must risk everything to continue their quest.

metas.name: Beast Games
metas.description: From the groundbreaking mind of MrBeast comes a new, record-breaking competition series. A staggering 1,000 players compete in nail-biting, physical, mental, and social challenges, for a chance to win a whopping $5 million dollar cash prize. Week by week, players will use their strength and wit to stay in the game, with the hope of being the multi-million-dollar winner.

videos.title: Strong vs Smart Compete for $5,000,000
videos.overview: 200 of the strongest competitors and smartest minds in the world battle for 100 spots in Beast City to keep fighting for their chance at the $5,000,000 prize. Only the best of each team will advance as the Strong compete in a game of perseverance while the Smart battle in a game of focus - who will move on and who will go home?

videos.title: Choose Your Fate
videos.overview: After an unexpected twist, the 50 Smartest and 50 Strongest face their biggest decision yet. A $1,000,000 bribe is on the line that could change the course of the entire season: will the contestants accept MrBeast's life-changing offer? Or will they risk it all and bet everything on a challenge of their choice? The stakes couldn't be higher as players fight to earn their place among the Top 50.

videos.title: The Obstacle Course
videos.overview: The Top 50 face their next brutal challenge, an obstacle course that demands the perfect balance of strength and smarts. As new alliances form and old friendships crumble, every victory counts with only half the contestants advancing. A fan-favorite challenge returns, testing loyalty and shattering promises. Everyone has a price, but who will break first?

videos.title: The Survivor Takeover
videos.overview: Survivor and Beast Games collide in the biggest competition crossover of all-time! Legendary host Jeff Probst joins MrBeast as contestants arrive on the world-famous Survivor island. Players face a series of iconic Survivor-inspired challenges with a $1,800,000 private island on the line. It all comes down to a Final Tribal Council… who will be Beast Games' newest millionaire?

metas.name: Made in Korea
metas.description: Set in the 1970's, Baek Gi Tae is an ambitious man, who thirsts for wealth and power. Jang Gun Young is a prosecutor with animalistic instinct and fearsome tenacity. Facing a major incident, Jang Gun Young throws his everything to stop Baek Gi Tae. The people around them include Lobbyist Choi Yu Ji, Investigator Oh Ye Jin, Bae Geum Ji and Chief Secretary Chun Suk Jung.

videos.title: War of Blood
videos.overview: Geonyoung figures out how to arrest Kitae, who obliviously continues to expand his business.

videos.title: Made in Korea
videos.overview: Kitae searches for a new business partner with Yuji, while Geonyoung sets a trap to catch him.

metas.name: Taskaree: The Smuggler's Web
metas.description: A dedicated customs officer and his team take on a notorious smuggler leading a powerful syndicate, but unexpected obstacles threaten their mission.

videos.title: Customs vs Popat
videos.overview: Amid mounting pressure to curb smuggling at Mumbai airport, officer Prakash Kumar takes charge and ends Arjun Meena's suspension so he can lead the team.

videos.title: Bada Choudhary
videos.overview: Arjun forms his A-Team with formerly suspended officers Mitali and Ravinder, as Prakash tasks them with taking down the Bada Choudhary syndicate.

videos.title: The Priya Story
videos.overview: Caught smuggling gold by Arjun, flight attendant Priya goes undercover for him. The World Customs Conference offers a chance to trap the smugglers.

videos.title: Operation Longshot
videos.overview: The customs team mounts a large-scale sting to intercept gold smugglers converging on Mumbai. Bada Choudhary senses something is wrong.

videos.title: Hum Coin Hain
videos.overview: Prakash is sent to Bangkok, where he meets an unexpected visitor. The search of a suspect's home leads the officers to a troubling incident.

videos.title: Darr Ka Dhandha
videos.overview: The Choudhary syndicate strikes back with violence and intimidation against the customs officers. Ravinder's reckless move drags him deeper into trouble.

videos.title: Kahani Khatam
videos.overview: Arjun gets crucial information from Srikant Saxena. As the syndicate tries one final gold smuggling run, can the officers stop them before it's too late?

metas.name: Dimension 20
metas.description: Heed the call of adventure and enter Dimension 20 where Game Master Brennan Lee Mulligan, joined by comedians and pro gamers, blends comedy with tabletop RPGs.

videos.title: Welcome to the Wastes
videos.overview: In an apocalyptic world, a team of do-gooders seek to put a little hospitality in the inhospitable.

metas.name: Wild Cards
metas.description: Wild Cards follows the unlikely duo of a gruff, sardonic cop and a spirited, clever con woman. Ellis, a demoted detective, has unfortunately spent the last year on the maritime unit, while Max has been living a transient life elaborately scamming everyone she meets. But when Max gets arrested and ends up helping Ellis solve a local crime, the two are offered the opportunity to redeem themselves, with Ellis going back to detective and Max staying out of jail. The catch? They have to work together, with each using their unique skills to solve crimes. For Ellis, that means hard-boiled shoe leather police work; for Max, it means accents, schemes and generally befriending everyone in sight, while driving Ellis absolutely nuts. Against the backdrop of beautiful Vancouver — with all its unique, charming, and even contradictory neighbourhoods and subcultures — the two will have to learn what it means to trust another person and maybe actually become partners.

videos.title: Rack 'Em Up
videos.overview: Max and Ellis hunt a pool shark's killer, while Max's mom returns from the grave with a vengeful crime lord trailing her who puts the whole family in the danger.

videos.title: Quit Playing Games (With My Life)
videos.overview: Max and Ellis probe a fiery murder on her favorite 90s boy band's reunion tour, sifting through frosted tips and oversized egos to unmask the killer.

metas.name: Dickinson's Real Deal
metas.description: David Dickinson presents the show in which members of the public bring items to be valued by a team of experts. If the member of the public decides to they can sell the item to the dealer, however if not we follow the item as it is auctioned off, to see if they made the right decision to not sell the item to the dealer.

videos.title: Leeds 2
videos.overview: David Dickinson and his team assess items at the Royal Armouries Museum in Leeds, where one lucky seller brings in a set of silver berry spoons bought in a charity shop for just £5 and a collection of jewellery left in a shoe box helps pay for a holiday. A Moorcroft vase is sold to buy a dinosaur for the seller's grandson and a curiosity box has a very valuable surprise inside.

videos.title: Burton 2
videos.overview: David Dickinson and his team of dealers are in Burton-on-Trent, where a big collection of gold jewellery gets a huge cash offer. There is a massive collection of teddy bears up for sale, and an unfashionable set of 1960s lights in need of a happy new home.

videos.title: Coventry 2
videos.overview: David Dickinson and his dealers are in Coventry, where a set of previously unseen Beatles photographs creates plenty of interest. A silver collection pays to replace a burnt down shed and fishing rod collection and a Lowry print is found hidden in a wardrobe.

metas.name: Countdown
metas.description: The show in which two contestants engage in a battle of wits, competing against the clock in games of lexical dexterity and numerical agility.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: Colin Murray, Rachel Riley and Susie Dent host, with Debbie McGee in Dictionary Corner, as contestants race against the clock to pit their wits against vowels, consonants and numbers.

videos.title: Episode 3
videos.overview: Colin Murray, Rachel Riley and Susie Dent host, with Debbie McGee in Dictionary Corner, as contestants race against the clock to pit their wits against vowels, consonants and numbers.

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: Colin Murray, Rachel Riley and Susie Dent host, with Debbie McGee in Dictionary Corner, as contestants race against the clock to pit their wits against vowels, consonants and numbers.

videos.title: Episode 6
videos.overview: Colin Murray, Rachel Riley and Susie Dent host, with Mark Durden-Smith in Dictionary Corner, as contestants race against the clock to pit their wits against vowels, consonants and numbers.

videos.title: Episode 7
videos.overview: Colin Murray, Rachel Riley and Susie Dent host, with Mark Durden-Smith in Dictionary Corner, as contestants race against the clock to pit their wits against vowels, consonants and numbers.

videos.title: Episode 8
videos.overview: Colin Murray, Rachel Riley and Susie Dent host, with Mark Durden-Smith in Dictionary Corner, as contestants race against the clock to pit their wits against vowels, consonants and numbers.

videos.title: Episode 9
videos.overview: Colin Murray, Rachel Riley and Susie Dent host, with Mark Durden-Smith in Dictionary Corner, as contestants race against the clock to pit their wits against vowels, consonants and numbers.

metas.name: The Good Stuff with Mary Berg
metas.description: A daily hour of fun, food, and laughs, featuring lifestyle trends, home hacks, audience games, and inspiring stories – all from top experts.

videos.title: Episode 77
videos.overview: Mary's budget-friendly pasta; where to save and splurge on beauty; quick and easy household fixes; tips on how singles can build savings.

videos.title: Episode 78
videos.overview: Mary and her guests make delicious dishes and drinks using bold new flavours to switch up mealtime.

videos.title: Episode 79
videos.overview: Mary's chipotle chicken soup; Mary and her mom try salsa dancing; stylish living room makeover; author Cecelia Ahern.

videos.title: Episode 80
videos.overview: Mary and Lidia Bastianich cook stuffed shells; best winter deals; organizing habits that stick; winter weekend getaways.

videos.title: Episode 81
videos.overview: Colin and Justin decorate with Pantone's colour of the year; discover what sleep animal you are; Golden Globes fashion roundup; Ennis Esmer.

videos.title: Episode 82
videos.overview: Cozy House Party: Girls' night in pjs; cheap 'n fancy drinks;' three party-perfect dips; Lainey Lui's must-watch list; spa day at home.

metas.name: Time is Money
metas.description: Time is Money is a high-stakes quiz show that offers a unique twist: contestants begin with their prize money already on the line and must race against the clock to keep it. If they fail to answer correctly, their cash prize slips away. The final player remaining will take home everything they've managed to save — making every decision a potential game-changer.

videos.title: Episode 8
videos.overview: Sara Davies hosts the quiz in which contestants are given their prize money before they have answered a question, and must race against time to keep hold of it. Each player stands before an hourglass-shaped money timer that begins to drain as the questions are asked - and the only way of stopping it is to answer correctly. Once the money is gone, the contestant is out - and only one can make the final to play for the amount they have managed to save.

videos.title: Episode 9
videos.overview: Sara Davies hosts the quiz in which contestants are given their prize money before they have answered a question, and must race against time to keep hold of it. Each player stands before an hourglass-shaped money timer that begins to drain as the questions are asked - and the only way of stopping it is to answer correctly. Once the money is gone, the contestant is out - and only one can make the final to play for the amount they have managed to save.

videos.title: Episode 10
videos.overview: Sara Davies hosts the quiz in which contestants are given their prize money before they have answered a question, and must race against time to keep hold of it. Each player stands before an hourglass-shaped money timer that begins to drain as the questions are asked - and the only way of stopping it is to answer correctly. Once the money is gone, the contestant is out - and only one can make the final to play for the amount they have managed to save.

metas.name: Today
metas.description: Daily magazine show featuring entertainment and celebrity news, consumer advice, and Ireland's biggest giveaways.

metas.name: Garden Rescue
metas.description: Charlie Dimmock and award-winning garden designers the Rich brothers compete to design gardens for homeowners around the country.

videos.title: Swindon
videos.overview: Chris Hull and Charlie Dimmock are in Swindon to transform Andy and Mandi's garden, which is full of awkward level changes, into an Italian courtyard with clever links to the rest of the plot.

metas.name: A New Life in the Sun
metas.description: Series following intrepid expats as they chase a dream life in the sun and set up new businesses abroad. Just how easy is it to start a new life, and is the grass really greener on the other side?

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: Emily and Dave face a steep learning curve as they prepare their French pub for its grand opening. In Spain, Mother Nature hampers Nigel and Fede's guesthouse renovation, while B&B owner Emma gets creative as she trials art classes for her guests.

videos.title: Episode 3
videos.overview: It's first orders at Emily and Dave's new pub in France, but with kitchen dramas and an overflowing bar keeping them on their toes, success is not guaranteed. Emma takes her Spanish B&B in a new direction and there's a call to arms as DIY novices Nigel and Fede try to keep their Spanish guesthouse renovation going.

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: After winning the keys to a French B&B on a TV game show, Nichola and Roy from Belfast claim their life-changing prize. Plumbing problems plague the renovations of Nigel and Fede's former guesthouse in Spain, while in France, Emily and Dave open their kitchen in a bid to keep the tills ringing at their new pub.

videos.title: Episode 5
videos.overview: In France, Nichola and Roy welcome their first B&B guests, while new publicans Emily and Dave try to capitalise on the busy summer season. Over in Spain, Nigel and Fede open the doors to their newly renovated guest house. Will their hard work pay off?

videos.title: Episode 6
videos.overview: In Italy, Rob and Fran from London gamble it all on a new family home and a glampsite. In France, novice hosts Racheal and Jay begin to convert a rundown farmhouse into holiday gîtes, while antiques enthusiast Ian opens his own shop and starts to renovate a house in his dream location.

videos.title: Episode 7
videos.overview: At Rob and Fran's glampsite in Italy, an ambitious open-air event space is under construction, but is it wind proof? In France, will a prime location be enough to entice customers into Ian's antiques shop? And renovations continue at Racheal and Jay's farmhouse, but an injury causes an unexpected setback.

videos.title: Episode 8
videos.overview: There's a tight turnaround for Rob and Fran's glampsite in Italy when guests request an early check-in. Renovations are rapid at Ian's new venture in France, but with the budget blown, can he open his B&B before the money runs out? And novice wine makers Racheal and Jay tackle vineyard maintenance, with mixed results.

videos.title: Episode 9
videos.overview: In Italy, Rob and Fran host local food producers at their glampsite, showcasing their very own olive oil. In Bulgaria, Lynn and David battle bureaucracy to build their new life. In France, Racheal and Jay aim to branch out with log cabins, but the wood delivery is nowhere to be seen.

metas.name: Deal or No Deal
metas.description: The iconic TV series Deal or No Deal is back but in a brand-new setting with brand-new prize boxes and a new batch of contestants hoping to win a whopping cash prize but who will have what it takes to beat our brand new Banker?

metas.name: Ros na Rún
metas.description: Ros na Rún is a soap opera set in the fictional village of Ros na Rún, focusing on the domestic and professional lives of its residents. The only soap in the world which is produced in the Irish language (English subtitles available) Filmed in the heart of the Connemara Gaeltacht in Galway on the Wild Atlantic Way, it is the single largest independent production commissioned in the history of Irish broadcasting and currently the most concentrated production centre outside of Dublin and Wicklow.

videos.title: Episode 34
videos.overview: Tadhg grows increasingly uneasy as detective Ken circles closer, but he is shocked when he is arrested for Risteard's murder. Still furious about what happened to Lorcán, Mo lashes out and blames Béibhinn for calling the authorities. Beneath her anger, she begins to wonder if she could be the one to provide Lorcán with a stable home.

videos.title: Episode 35
videos.overview: Tadhg's confidence dwindles under Ken's sharp questioning. What starts as bravado quickly turns to panic as the walls close in on him. Sonny's charm falls flat when his attempt to woo Cóilí Jackie goes awry. Mo grows increasingly annoyed with Mack's attitude towards Lorcán.

videos.title: Episode 36
videos.overview: Tadhg endures a tense wait before finally being granted bail, only to be blindsided by who paid it. His shock doesn't end there when he learns that female DNA was found on Risteard's body.

metas.name: Pole to Pole with Will Smith
metas.description: Inspired by his late mentor to explore life's big questions, Will throws himself into incredible challenges for 100 days: skiing to the South Pole, catching a giant anaconda, milking a venomous tarantula, climbing mountains, and diving under the ice of the North Pole. He will venture from pole to pole in the company of scientists, explorers and local experts. Told with a cinematic scale, access, and authenticity only National Geographic can deliver, this once-in-a-lifetime adventure blends cutting-edge science, environmental storytelling, and bold exploration. Guided by experts, scientists and explorers, Will helps make world-first scientific discoveries and forges profound human connections — from the Amazon's Waorani community to the Kalahari's San people,whose knowledge and resilience offer powerful lessons about our future on the planet. Pole to Pole with Will Smith is an epic global undertaking defined by endurance, wonder and hope.

videos.title: The South Pole
videos.overview: Will heads to the South Pole, where temperatures can drop below minus 100 degrees Fahrenheit. He skis and treks across giant icefields, and, faced with a giant cliff of ice in bone-chilling winds, struggles to climb to the top. Only with the support of one of the world's best polar athletes, Richard Parks, does he succeed. In one of the planet's most isolated research stations, scientists take ice cores deep under the surface and make incredible sacrifices to pursue their research.

videos.title: The Amazon: Deadly Creatures
videos.overview: Will, a man scared of spiders his whole life, ventures deep into the Ecuadorian Amazon on an expedition in search of deadly creatures. Joined by professor Bryan Fry and local mountaineer Carla Perez, they abseil 200 feet into a cave network known as the "womb of the Earth," where they discover a giant tarantula. Using cutting-edge techniques, they extract its venom, which could hold the key to saving millions of lives.

videos.title: The Amazon: Dark Waters
videos.overview: Will, Bryan and Carla join local Waorani elder Penti Baihua in the Amazon, in search of the world's biggest snake: the giant green anaconda. They carefully remove just one scale from the 17-foot snake's skin. Will's fear turns into relief, then joy. The single scale can reveal the health of the entire ecosystem — crucial for the future of both wildlife and the Waorani.

videos.title: The Himalayas
videos.overview: Will travels to the kingdom of Bhutan on a deeply intimate journey in search of the secret to happiness. Guided by happiness expert professor Dacher Keltner and local writer Tshering Denkar, Will treks to one of the highest and happiest villages in the Himalayas, at 13,000-foot altitude. While there, he confronts some of the most challenging moments of his extraordinary life and career.

videos.title: The Pacific Islands
videos.overview: Joined by linguist Dr. Mary Walworth and local marine ecologist John Aini, Will travels to the South Pacific on an expedition to a remote island threatened by rising seas. What begins as an exploration into an incredible marine paradise transforms into a truly revelatory journey for Will about his own history as they record a lost language spoken by only five people.

videos.title: The Kalahari Desert
videos.overview: Will travels deep into the Kalahari Desert to meet the San people, one of the oldest hunter-gatherer groups on Earth. To discover the secret to their enduring success, he must join them on a hunt in one of the most inhospitable places on the planet. Led by local San bushman guide Kane Motswana, it's not long before he realizes he's entirely unsuited to this adventure.

videos.title: The North Pole
videos.overview: The final leg of Will's 100-day adventure is his most dangerous mission yet: an expedition to dive under the ice at the North Pole to help polar ecologist Allison Fong capture world-first scientific samples. But when a snowstorm and mechanical failure put the mission in crisis, Will learns what it takes to be a hero in real life.

metas.name: Wheel of Fortune
metas.description: Contestants guess hidden phrases by guessing letters one at a time. Contestants win money or prizes, as determined by a spin of the wheel, for each correct consonant they guess. But they have to pay to see what vowels are in a puzzle. The contestant that has amassed the most winnings at the end of a game goes on to play the bonus round, in which the player can win even more -- prizes frequently seen in the bonus round include automobiles, vacations and more cash.

videos.title: Collette Spin, Solve & See the World
Collette Spin, Solve & See the World
Collette Spin, Solve & See the World
Collette Spin, Solve & See the World

metas.name: 25 Words or Less
metas.description: 25 Words or Less includes two teams comprised of celebrities and civilians against each other in a fast-paced word game with a top prize of $10,000. In the beginning rounds of the game, after a frenzied bidding session, one team member provides clues to two partners to help them guess a list of five words using fewer than 25 clue words. In the final round, the contestant who has earned the most points has 60 seconds to get his partners to guess 10 words using only 25 words or less.

videos.title: They Got Swept Up in This Word
videos.overview: The pressure rises, the guesses pile up, and the clock doesn't care; do they ride it out or get overwhelmed?

videos.title: This Clue Aged Well ... The Guesses Didn't
videos.overview: The team circles the obvious but can't land the exact word; does the last clue finally pour it out?

videos.title: This Game Had Everyone Clenching
videos.overview: The tension is high, and the word is stubborn; can they pull it together before time runs out?

videos.title: They Tried to Rise to the Occasion: Did It Work?
videos.overview: The pressure's rising, and so is the timer; can they keep it light -- or will this round collapse at the end?

videos.title: Can They Find the Answer Without Starting a War?
videos.overview: The tension builds, the clock shrinks, and everyone wants control: Do they align fast enough to land the word?

videos.title: Can They Deliver the Win Before Time Runs Out?
videos.overview: The pressure is heavy and the timer is unforgiving: Do they haul in the right answer, or get stuck in traffic?

videos.title: This Word Doubled the Pressure Instantly
videos.overview: One clue multiplies the chaos and the clock doesn't wait -- can they keep it simple and land the exact word in time?

videos.title: This Word Took Them Up a Steep Hill
videos.overview: The game starts smooth, then one clue turns into a climb -- can they keep pace and reach the answer before time runs out?

metas.name: Junior Bake Off
metas.description: Harry Hill hosts, as judges Liam Charles and Ravneet Gill take on the tough task of finding Britain's best junior baker.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: Harry Hill presents as the youngsters take on a baseball-themed technical challenge for biscuit day, after which they bake giant cookie that teleports them 20 years into the future.

videos.title: Episode 3
videos.overview: It's bread day for the heat one bakers, as Liam Charles challenges them to put the pizazz into pizza. In the showstopper, they must recreate their 'roll' models in bread.

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: It's Dessert Day for the first heat of bakers, and judge Ravneet Gill is hoping that a delicate touch 'shell' lead to perfect meringues in her Technical challenge. For the Showstopper, the bakers turn cherished memories into delicious brownies illustrating the best day of their lives. Liam Charles also judges the offerings, alongside host Harry Hill.

videos.title: Episode 5
videos.overview: It's the final day for the heat one bakers as they take on Pastry Day for their last chance to earn their crust in Finals Week. In the Technical, judge Ravneet Gill keeps things deceptively simple with a no-frills pastry challenge, while for their Showstopper the bakers unleash their inner Picasso with a self pie-trait. Liam Charles also judges the offerings, alongside host Harry Hill.

videos.title: Episode 6
videos.overview: It's Cake Day for the second heat of bakers, and Liam Charles hopes that they don't fleece an Australian classic in the Technical. For their Showstopper, the bakers recreate their worst nightmare in cake form! But whose dream of becoming Star Baker will come true?

videos.title: Episode 7
videos.overview: The second heat of bakers face the trials and tribulations of Biscuit Day as judges Ravneet Gill and Liam Charles set a supersized Technical challenge and a Showstopper that will break records.

videos.title: Episode 8
videos.overview: On Bread Day, Liam Charles sets a Technical challenge inspired by his favourite holiday, Halloween, and the bakers create their inner animal in bread form for the Showstopper.

videos.title: Episode 9
videos.overview: On Dessert Day, Liam Charles asks for a pudding that packs the perfect punch in the Technical challenge and the bakers create 'Pocket Money Cream Pies'.

metas.name: Jeopardy!
metas.description: Jeopardy! is a classic game show -- with a twist. The answers are given first, and the contestants supply the questions. Three contestants, including the previous show's champion, compete in six categories and in three rounds (with each round's "answers" being worth more prize money).

videos.title: 2026 Champions Wildcard Quarterfinals Matchup Game 2, Show # 9407.
videos.overview: Michelle Tsai / Originally Honolulu, Hawai'i, Tutor; Dave Bond / Rochester, New York, Art Student; Geoff Barnes / Washington, D.C., Analyst.

videos.title: 2026 Champions Wildcard Quarterfinals Matchup Game 3, Show # 9408.
videos.overview: Cameron Berry / Brighton, Massachusetts, Data Analyst & College Administrator; Harvey Silikovitz / Originally West Orange, New Jersey, Attorney & Worldwide Karaoke Singer; Jason Singer / Portland, Maine, Real Estate Agent.

videos.overview: Pete Johnston / Originally Alma, Michigan, Filmmaker & Educator; Vickie Talvola / Jersey City, New Jersey, Quantitative Trader; Jonathan Hugendubler / Baltimore, Maryland, Adjunct Professor & Trivia Host.
