videos.overview: Stella Trout / Originally Houston, Texas, Software Engineer; Ian Morrison / Originally Aurora, Colorado, Airline Ramp Agent; Harvey Silikovitz / Originally West Orange, New Jersey, Attorney & Worldwide Karaoke Singer.

metas.name: The Ms. Pat Show
metas.description: The multi-camera sitcom will tell the story of a former convicted felon turned suburban mom (Ms. Pat), whose hustle and resilient spirit was forged on the streets of Atlanta. To much reserve, she now finds herself in conservative middle America alongside her well-intentioned husband. The struggle of a sister,and two distinct sets of kids, raised under very different circumstances.

videos.title: Killin' and Dyin
videos.overview: Overwhelmed by work and her kids' squabbling, Pat lands in the hospital and is ordered to rest, but she's determined to make it to a show to impress a big comedian.

videos.title: Wild Goose Chase
videos.overview: During a family yard sale, Ashley misplaces Lloyd's ashes and his final letter; Pat and Terry barter with a young girl to recover a very personal VHS tape.

videos.title: License & Registration
videos.overview: Janelle stresses over Pat messing up her college registration and Terry being an overprotective dad, but it's Junebug who will need protection after he drunkenly crashes Pat's car.

videos.title: Give It Arrest
videos.overview: Pat lands in the hospital again when she continues to neglect her self-care, and if she won't listen to her family, then maybe she'll listen to a good scolding from Rabbit.

metas.name: Hot Bench
metas.description: Three judges argue the merits of a case among themselves and render a verdict.

videos.title: One Man's Treasure Is Another Man's... Lemon!

metas.name: The Perfect Line
metas.description: The Perfect Line is a trivia game that includes questions about from world events, pop culture, sports, science and other topics. Contestants are given a category and then arrange events, items or people order — such as arranging six actors in the order of their worldwide box office gross. Winners are able to create "the perfect line" via that correct order, and try not to be eliminated after every round. The last person standing plays a final round for a chance at $10,000.

videos.title: Going for the Gold
videos.overview: Players Russ, Tan, Karen and Shackisha.

videos.title: Get Outta Town!
videos.overview: Players Craig, Erin, Lee-Ann and Keisha.

videos.title: Anybody's Game
videos.overview: Players Shanese, Rocco, Robin and Brad.

metas.name: Flip Side
metas.description: In Flip Side two teams of players attempt to determine the sentiments of two distinct groups regarding the same issue. Teams make their selections from multiple-choice answers, and the correct choice secures the pot.

videos.title: A Whole Vibe
videos.overview: Khemi and Patrice battle Terry and Javi.

videos.title: Pop the Champagne!
videos.overview: Father and son Rick and Reed face off with co-workers Tien and Linda.

videos.title: That's a Big Deal
videos.overview: Lynda and Valerie battle Courtney and Jeff.

metas.name: Pointless
metas.description: Contestants have to try and score as few points as possible as they compete against one another.

metas.name: Richard Osman's House of Games
metas.description: Richard Osman's House of Games is a game show in which a group of four celebrities go toe to toe in testing their general knowledge skills in a variety of entertaining trivia-based games.Competing over the course of a week, each day the celebrity contestants will take on a series of challenging quiz games selected by the host, teatime quiz legend, Richard Osman. A daily winner will be declared following a quick-fire round at the end of each show as the scores are tallied across the week resulting in an overall champion being crowned on Friday. Will the winning stars opt for the much coveted House of Games driving gloves, or instead go for the must-have branded dressing gown?

videos.overview: Huge Davies, Amy Dowden, Humphrey Ker and Jamie-Lee O'Donnell test their general knowledge skills on this week's House of Games.

videos.overview: Hammed Animashaun, Adam Buxton, Lisa Snowdon and Lorna Watson test their general knowledge skills on this week's House of Games.

metas.name: A Place in the Sun
metas.description: Property experts help house hunters find their dream properties in the sun.

videos.title: Side, Turkey
videos.overview: Ben Hillman travels to Turkey to help John and daughter Cathy with their search for a family holiday home in the historic town of Side, showing them properties to meet their £170,000 budget.

videos.title: Costa Blanca
videos.overview: Jean Johansson shows Jo and Denzil five properties on the Costa Blanca, all within their £110,000 budget, in the hope they can fulfil their dream of owning their own holiday home.

videos.title: Limousin
videos.overview: Fiona's looking for a holiday home in the French countryside of Limousin, that one day she can move to permanently. Limousin is a rural retreat often referred to as the French Lake District, boasting wonderful walks, cycling and plenty of water sports. With best friend Tina joining the search, Craig Rowe shows Fiona what her maximum budget of £80,000 can buy, from a complete non-starter and a disappointing doer-upper to a tremendous townhouse.

videos.title: Southern Tenerife
videos.overview: Liz and Noel fell in love with Tenerife 15 years ago and have been going back every year since. With 200 miles of stunning coastline, southern Tenerife is an extremely popular part of the island, making it a very attractive place for house-hunters. The pair are after a home from home to escape the British cold and enjoy the Canarian winter sun. Laura Hamilton shows them the best of what their £320,000 budget can buy, from a cosy apartment in Los Cristianos to a Golden-mile gem.

videos.title: Manilva, Costa del Sol
videos.overview: Jasmine Harman helps married couple Jerome and Meik with their hunt for a holiday home in the Manilva region of the Costa del Sol in southern Spain.

videos.title: Orlando, Florida
videos.overview: Retired teachers Jane and Steven seek the help of Laura Hamilton in their search for a holiday home in Orlando, Florida, with a budget of £350,000.

videos.title: Valencia, Spain
videos.overview: Ben Hillman helps couple Polly and Andrew find their dream holiday home for retirement in Valencia, Spain with a budget of £250,000.

videos.title: West Coast, Cyprus
videos.overview: Jean Johansson helps restaurant owners Skevy and David find a holiday home on the West Coast of Cyprus near to Skevy's Cypriot family, with a budget of £400,000.

metas.name: The Six O'Clock Show
metas.description: A fast-paced, witty chat show with some of Ireland's biggest celebrities. The show also delivers expert guidance on everything from consumer affairs to the latest trends.

metas.name: Millionaire Hot Seat
metas.description: Millionaire Hot Seat is a fast-paced, tactical twist on the classic format. Hosted by Jeremy Clarkson, the show places six contestants in a rotating "hot seat", demanding quick thinking, strategy and composure under pressure.Six contestants compete in a queue around the Hot Seat. Only the contestant currently in the Hot Seat can answer questions on the money ladder.Answer correctly → climb the ladderAnswer incorrectly → you're out, and the top prize drops. Pass → you stay in the game, but return to the back of the queue.Passed questions must be answered by the next player correctly to stay, answer incorrectly and they're out.Only the top remaining prize can be won.

videos.title: Episode 6
videos.overview: Jeremy Clarkson hosts the quiz where each episode sees six hopefuls compete for a one-million-pound prize. However, only one player can take their place in the Hot Seat at a time and answer multiple-choice questions to work their way up the Money Ladder.

videos.title: Episode 7
videos.overview: Jeremy Clarkson hosts the quiz where each episode sees six hopefuls compete for a one-million-pound prize. However, only one player can take their place in the Hot Seat at a time and answer multiple-choice questions to work their way up the Money Ladder.

metas.name: Abandoned Engineering
metas.description: As the saying goes – they probably seemed like good ideas at the time. The world is peppered with examples of incredible engineering projects and buildings designed to make life easier for those that used them, amaze those that came to see them, and make money for those that ordered, designed and built them. They were the stuff of dreams. Often enormous engineering problems had to be resolved, obstacles overcome and new innovations employed just to get them built in the first place. Alas, a great number of these remarkable structures have now been abandoned, cast aside like enormous expensive out-of-date toys, never to be used in the ways for which they were intended. Each and every one of these extraordinary places is home to a wealth of powerful and compelling stories. We'll see and hear about some of the most spectacular examples of abandoned engineering the world has eve...

videos.title: Escape from Dunkirk
videos.overview: Exploring the nerve centre of a heroic rescue mission in England, a dilapidated mansion in Virginia raided during the Civil War, and a facility in Detroit where a champion made his name.

videos.title: The Invisible Enemy
videos.overview: Exploring a top-secret facility in Scotland besieged by militant protesters, and a small Greek island caught in a chilling web of controversy.

metas.name: Landscape Artist of the Year
metas.description: Filmed at picturesque locations around the UK, contestants paint some of the UK's most spectacular scenery for a chance to win a £10,000 commission for the National Trust's permanent collection. Through several rounds, winners are selected to advance to the semifinal, and then to the final.

videos.title: Derwentwater
videos.overview: The contest begins at Derwentwater in the Lake District, where new judge Eva Langret joins returning host Stephen Mangan and experts Tai Shan Schierenberg and Kathleen Soriano.

metas.name: The Traitors
metas.description: Nail-biting psychological competition where 22 strangers play the ultimate reality game of detection, backstabbing and trust, in the hope of winning up to £120,000.

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: New day, new drama as the players arrive to a breakfast that poses more questions than provides answers. It isn't long before they take their seats at the Round Table, but can new leads present an opportunity to oust a Traitor, or have the Faithful been hoodwinked? Following a mission that reveals just how important the players' lives really are to one another, the Traitors are set for an unforgettable night.

videos.title: Episode 5
videos.overview: Following a sleepless night, the players arrive at breakfast eager to share their latest thoughts on the Traitors' gameplay. With a mission focused on protection from murder, true intentions are laid bare. A fractious Round Table causes the game to heat up, and repercussions of the latest banishment create new suspicions - but can the Traitors keep control?

videos.title: Episode 6
videos.overview: As the game reaches the half-way point, are the players inching closer to uncovering the Traitors? The mission encourages everyone to reflect on their time in the castle, and money for the prize pot is not the only tempting thing on offer. As numbers dwindle, tension rises at the Round Table. The evening brings the Faithful a unique opportunity that could change the course of the game - if played correctly.

videos.title: Episode 7
videos.overview: As the Traitors continue navigating their way through the game, they plot their next move in the dead of night. Breakfast dials up the pressure and brings fresh allegations to the table, but will anyone catch on? With attention focused on building the prize pot, today's mission requires the upmost trust amongst the players. As darkness descends over the castle, suspicions continue to rise at the Round Table - but can the Traitors deflect, or will the Faithful see through their lies?

videos.title: Episode 8
videos.overview: As the game continues, breakfast delivers a wake-up call for the Faithful, with the Traitors making their next dastardly move. The mission proves to be a living nightmare for the players, but can they hold their nerve? The nightmare continues at the Round Table as the Traitors try to deceive the Faithful into banishing one of their own. It's a simple question - who do you think is a Traitor? - but the answer is far more complex.

metas.name: Kirstie and Phil's Love It or List It
metas.description: Phil Spencer and Kirstie Allsopp go head to head as they battle it out to convince homeowners to either sell their home or refurbish it.They're standing by to help UK homeowners who are divided over staying put or selling up. Kirstie is on hand to teach you that with clever design and spending wisely it's possible to fall in "love" with your home all over again, while Phil thinks there are dream homes within reach and that you should sell up and "list it".

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer return, beginning by helping Julia and Simon, who bought their home in Waterfoot in East Renfrewshire three years ago. Wth four children, one bathroom (with no bath), a small kitchen and a dining room referred to as a roundabout, serial house hunter Simon is ready to call it quits, while Julia has set down roots and is desperate to make their home work after moving six times in 10 years.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: Kirstie Allsopp and Phil Spencer help Karol and Richard with their tired and impractical three-bedroom bungalow in St Osyth, Essex. They bought their home in 2022 after Richard's long-term prostate cancer diagnosis, hoping that single-storey living would ease future care but the practical plan has sparked tension. Karol is ready to list it. She's fed up with the dated décor, the tiny kitchen that can't fit the washing machine, and the single bathroom. But Richard is convinced that these issues can be solved. He would rather use the £22,000 potential moving costs to improve their house, but after 18 months of stasis, he needs Kirstie's help to find a way forward. Working with a £60,000 Love It budget, Kirstie proposes an internal reconfiguration to bring balance back to the home. But with Richard adjusting her plans from the beginning, she must draw on all her expertise to keep the project on course. Meanwhile, Phil faces his own challenges, finding sun-kissed gardens to satisfy Karol and enough kitchen storage for Richard, all within his £525,000 List It budget.

metas.name: Casualty 24/7
metas.description: Documentary series filmed inside Barnsley casualty department.

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: Life in the A&E department of Barnsley Hospital. In the hub, Sister Jane attempts to stay on top of the growing number of patients. Also, the chute that is used to transport bloods through the hospital efficiently has broken. An ambulance arrives with a woman who has a dangerously high heart rate, and volunteer Jane turns detective to try and reunite lost property with its owners.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: The hospital moves to a new patient and porter tracking system and service Manager Lindsey is in charge of implementing it. Paramedics arrive with eight-month-old Noah, who is struggling to breathe, accompanied by mum Maddie and dad Kieran. In minor injuries, Janet comes in with a badly broken wrist. Also, 78-year-old Kathleen, who has fallen over on her doorstep, is brought in by ambulance.

metas.name: Síorstíl
metas.description: Síorstíl is a cutting-edge sustainable fashion competition where six talented designers transform second-hand clothes and recycled materials into high fashion editorial garments. Over the course of six episodes, our contestants face a series of challenges in a bid to become Síorstíl champion.

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: Seven talented designers transform second-hand and recycled materials into high-fashion outfits. In this first edition, contestants are asked to design an outfit that best represents them, their personality and the clothes they like to wear. Eimear O'Reilly is the guest judge.

metas.name: Neven's English Food Tour
metas.description: Neven Maguire starts the new year with a new seven-part series: Neven's English Food Tour, on RTÉ One, which concentrates on the North East of England, including Newcastle, Northumberland and County Durham.

videos.title: Northumberland
videos.overview: Programme two takes Neven to Northumberland, the northernmost county in England, renowned for its wild expanse of countryside, and spectacular coastline

metas.name: Surgeons: A Matter of Life or Death
metas.description: Cameras follow life-saving operations at the University Hospitals Birmingham.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: Liz prepares for the removal of a satsuma-sized tumour sitting deep between the two sides of her brain, which gives her crippling headaches. However, the operation poses the risk of a life-threatening bleed or leaving her blinded. Also, surgeons must remove a gigantic breast tumour from Anna, along with a number of her ribs to give her the best chance of survival.

metas.name: The Showjumper Murder
metas.description: When Northern Irish showjumper Katie Simpson died unexpectedly in August 2020, the horse community accepted that she had taken her own life. However, a local journalist questioned the official conclusion revealing how a secret investigation ended in a high-stakes murder trial.

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: Part one of two. When Northern Irish showjumper Katie Simpson died unexpectedly in August 2020, the horse community accepted that she had taken her own life. However, a local journalist questioned the official conclusion revealing how a secret investigation ended in a high-stakes murder trial.

metas.name: The Yorkshire Auction House
metas.description: Auctioneer Angus Ashworth has been running his auction house for more than a decade. With the help of his team and family, he clears out cluttered homes, uncovering hidden gems that he can sell at auction.

videos.title: A Secretive Box
videos.overview: Angus Ashworth clears a home of classic books to fund a trip for a widower, before the discovery of an unusual violin hits the high notes at auction.

videos.title: Send in the Cavalry!
videos.overview: From a D-Day hero's eccentric trove to church minister's heartfelt downsizing, Angus Ashworth sells a huge hippo and some holy bling.

metas.name: Aillte
metas.description: A stunning ode to the power and majesty of Irish sea cliffs, exploring the intimate relationships they have with the fascinating flora, fauna and the people that call them home. Marine biologist Cormac Mac Fhionnlaoich brings us on a mesmerising tour of the cliffs at Sliabh Liag.

videos.title: Sliabh Liag
videos.overview: Part one of two. Visits to Irish sea cliffs, exploring the intimate relationships they have with the fascinating flora, fauna and the people that call them home. Marine biologist Cormac McGinley offers a mesmerising tour of the cliffs at Sliabh Liag.

metas.name: Any Given Day: Cork University Hospital
metas.description: Following staff shifts and patient journeys across the hospital. Together, they tell a bigger story of Cork University Hospital on 'any given day'.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: In episode two, a 4-year-old girl is being rushed to hospital by ambulance. She is suffering prolonged seizures. Her condition continues to deteriorate enroute to hospital.

metas.name: Fatal Fall: Murder or Accident
metas.description: Fatal Fall: Murder or Accident is a shocking series built on a chilling premise: each episode examines a case where a victim was seemingly pushed to their death — from balconies and rooftops to cliffs, staircases, and bridges. Beyond the act itself, the series explores the interpersonal tensions and psychological buildup that led to these sudden and violent outcomes, often at the hands of someone they knew and loved, and the investigations that followed.Through expert analysis and testimony from those closest to the victims, the series reveals how ordinary moments can turn deadly in an instant, and asks the ultimate questions: who can you truly trust, what really happened, and why.

videos.title: Betrayal In The Backwoods
videos.overview: This episode unravels the case of Toni Henthorn, who was pushed to her death from a 160ft cliff in the Rocky Mountains by her husband.

metas.name: The Tonight Show
metas.description: Comment and analysis on the big stories of the day in Ireland and abroad with a panel of guests covering the key issues.

metas.name: Shifting Gears
metas.description: Shifting Gears centers on Matt, a stubborn, widowed owner of a classic car restoration shop. When Matt's estranged daughter and her teenage kids move into his house, the real restoration begins.

videos.title: Dog
videos.overview: When Matt refuses to let Carter bring a dog into "his" house, Riley starts to wonder if it's time for her and the kids to find their own place; Gabe seeks Riley's advice amid second thoughts about moving in with Amelie.

videos.title: Friend
videos.overview: Matt's reunion with a high school friend stirs up more than nostalgia when he meets their equally opinionated spouse; Riley spirals when Klatch gets a negative Yelp review.

metas.name: The Masked Singer
metas.description: Based on an international hit, which already is a viral phenomenon with more than half a billion fans worldwide, and the No. 1 top-trending video of 2017 on YouTube, The Masked Singer features celebrities facing off against one another with one major twist: each singer is shrouded from head to toe in an elaborate costume, complete with full face mask to conceal his or her identity. Ken Jeong, Jenny McCarthy, Nicole Scherzinger and Robin Thicke serve on the panel and play detective, alongside host Nick Cannon.

videos.title: Premiere
videos.overview: Five head-to-head performances; the season's first double-unmasking.

videos.title: Fear Night
videos.overview: A very special guest pays the panelists a visit... Johnny Knoxville; to receive crucial hints, the panelists must overcome their worst fears; the contestants take to the stage to share how they have faced their fears.

metas.name: Hollywood Squares
metas.description: Hollywood Squares involves two contestants who play tic-tac-toe to win money and prizes. The "board" for the game is a vertical stack of open-faced cubes, each occupied by a celebrity seated at a desk and facing the contestants. The celebrities are asked questions and the contestants judge the legitimacy of their answers to win the game.

videos.title: I Will Not Be Ignored, Glenn!
videos.overview: Celebrity contestants Anthony Anderson, Glenn Close, Pete Holmes, Whitney Cummings, Lil Rel Howery, Triumph the Insult Comic Dog, Leslie Jones and Ross Mathews.

videos.title: Between a Cardigan Sandwich
videos.overview: Celebrity contestants Whitney Cummings, Kat Dennings, Fortune Feimster, Pete Holmes, Tiffany Haddish, Padma Lakshmi, Joel McHale and RuPaul.

videos.title: This Is the Best Show on TV
videos.overview: Celebrity contestants Whitney Cummings, Ariana Debose, Fortune Feimster, Tiffany Haddish, Arsenio Hall, Lil Rel Howery, Jo Koy and Ms. Pat.

videos.title: I'm Terrified of Triumph
videos.overview: Celebrity contestants Anthony Anderson, Glenn Close, Whitney Cummings, Zarna Garg, Pete Holmes, Triumph the Insult Comic Dog, Leslie Jones and Jay Mohr.

metas.name: Nature
metas.description: For more than a quarter-century, Nature has brought the beauty and wonder of the natural world into American homes, becoming in the process the benchmark of natural history programs on American television. The series has won more than 600 honors from the television industry, the international wildlife film community, parent groups, and environmental organizations – including 10 Emmy Awards, three Peabody Awards, and the first honor ever given to a program by the Sierra Club.

videos.title: Tusker: Brotherhood of Elephants
videos.overview: Follow the complex lives of giant elephant bulls in Amboseli and Mount Kilimanjaro.

metas.name: Swamp People
metas.description: The Swamp People featured in this History series are the proud descendants of French Canadian refugees who settled in the swamp region of Louisiana in the 18th century. Cameras follow members of this fiercely independent group as they struggle to preserve their way of life in the Atchafalaya Basin during the most important time of the year for them: alligator-hunting season.

videos.title: High and Dry
videos.overview: At the dawn of a new season, flash-flood chaos from hundreds of miles north sends the bayou into a tailspin.

videos.title: Flash Flood
videos.overview: As historic floodwaters from the north swallow the bayou, Troy and Pickle struggle with drowned lines, until a lesson from a late swamp legend gives them a fighting chance.

metas.name: Alaska State Troopers
metas.description: In America's largest and wildest state, just 400 Alaska State Troopers are responsible for patrolling hundreds of miles in Fairbanks and the Mat-Su Valley and serve more than 230 remote villages only reachable by boat or plane. From the endless light of summer to the deep freeze of winter, each one-hour episode captures these men and women as they patrol the vast frontier by land, sea, and air. Alaska is the final stop for fugitives on the run, where danger is vast, distances are brutal, and backup can be hours away. From multi-agency criminal takedowns to life-saving search and rescue missions, the series showcases a range of calls Alaska State Troopers face that are as immense and unpredictable as the state itself.

metas.name: Chicago Med
metas.description: An emotional thrill ride through the day-to-day chaos of the city's newest state-of-the-art trauma center and into the lives of the courageous doctors, nurses and staff who hold it all together. This is one of those days.

videos.title: Triple Threat
videos.overview: The doctors deal with the professional and personal fallout from the choices made during a city-wide power outage.

metas.name: Love & Hip Hop: Miami
metas.description: As bold, edgy, gorgeous, and diverse as the city it's set in, Love & Hip Hop: Miami turns up the heat and doesn't hold back in making the 305 the place to be. Multi-platinum selling hip-hop legend Trick Daddy is back in the studio collaborating with his longtime musical ally and rap icon, "The Diamond Princess" Trina. Afro-Latina singer, Amara La Negra, faces roadblocks on her journey to cross over to the American music market while Jojo Zarur is an entrepreneur and celebrity stylist whose dreams of dominating the fashion industry might be derailed by family issues. Meanwhile Christopher "Prince" Michael Harty and DJ Michelle Pooch are enmeshed in a rivalry to claim party supremacy in the hot and competitive Miami nightlife scene. Miami street legend and rapper signed to Rick Ross' Maybach Music Group, Gunplay, has returned to Miami to stage a musical comeback but he finds himself sucked back into the temptations and vices of the "real" Miami, where his demons threaten the fate of both his career and his relationship.

metas.name: Ugliest House in America
metas.description: Comedian Retta travels across the country to tour properties nominated by their owners as the ugliest home around. After crowning the worst of the worst, designer Alison Victoria surprises the homeowners with a jaw-dropping $150,000 renovation!

metas.name: Indomptables
metas.description: Indomptables is a sweeping family saga with country influences, telling the story of two clans: the highly influential Richer family, owners of Richer Enterprises, led by Philippe, a man admired by all; and the formidable Martineau family, agricultural producers, disliked in the community and led by the gruff Michel. The two patriarchs are about to finalise a major transaction: Richer Enterprises will pass into the hands of the Martineaus. But this long-awaited agreement will be disrupted by a disturbing and unexpected event. From then on, everything is turned upside down for them, as well as for their three respective heirs, who soon find themselves caught in the crossfire of the merciless struggle that this event ignites between the two families. A war without rules or morals will have consequences that no one could have imagined…

metas.name: Abbott Elementary
metas.description: In this workplace comedy, a group of dedicated, passionate teachers — and a slightly tone-deaf principal — are brought together in a Philadelphia public school where, despite the odds stacked against them, they are determined to help their students succeed in life. Though these incredible public servants may be outnumbered and underfunded, they love what they do — even if they don't love the school district's less-than-stellar attitude toward educating children.

videos.title: Mall
videos.overview: Abbott Elementary returns from winter break at their new temporary school: an abandoned mall; the teachers deal with unique challenges that come with teaching in the new location.

videos.title: Mall Part 2: Questions & Concerns
videos.overview: Growing pains hit Abbott Elementary as the PTA pressures Janine and Gregory for answers; Jacob and Barbara become suspicious of Mr. Morton.

metas.name: Cheap A$$ Beach Houses
metas.description: Cheap A$$ Beach Houses airing later this year to humorously show viewers how to own a slice of affordable paradise.

metas.name: HOT ROD Garage
metas.description: Tony Angelo and Lucky Costa host a project build show that has all the tips, tricks and wrenching you would expect from the crew at Hot Rod Magazine.

metas.name: Allegiance
metas.description: Allegiance follows on identity and belonging, policing and politics, and finding truth within the heart of a flawed justice system. Sabrina Sohal is a star rookie police officer who must grapple with the limits of the justice system as she fights to exonerate her politician father Ajeet Sohal. Sohal serves her diverse hometown of Surrey alongside Vince Brambilla, a veteran training officer who sees her potential but doesn't always agree with her forward-thinking methods. Allegiance is the story of a young woman caught between her allegiance to her flag, to her badge, and to her family.

videos.title: Borderline Blue
videos.overview: Sabrina's career is up in the air after leaving her badge on the table, but a call brings her back where she confronts her actions of going rogue and goes on a journey from lone wolf to a team player.

videos.title: Blood & Berries
videos.overview: When a body is discovered in the Serpentine River, long-buried family secrets are unearthed. Meanwhile, Sabrina and Nate's relationship reaches a new level.

metas.name: Chicago Fire
metas.description: No job is more stressful, dangerous or exhilarating than those of the Firefighters, Rescue Squad and Paramedics of Chicago Firehouse 51. These are the courageous men and women who forge headfirst into danger when everyone else is running the other way and whose actions make the difference between life and death. These are their stories.

videos.title: A Man Possessed
videos.overview: When an act of arson harms someone close to the Firehouse 51 family, Severide must track down the perpetrator. Impending budget cuts push Mouch and Pascal to get creative.

videos.title: Crime of Passion
videos.overview: A member of the Firehouse 51 family remains in peril. Cruz lends a hand to Severide in the ongoing investigation.

metas.name: My Strange Addiction
metas.description: Some people turn to chocolate when stressed, others will indulge with a little retail therapy and maybe schedule a massage, but the individuals featured on My Strange Addiction resort to extreme and unusual things in an effort to emotionally regulate themselves. Some of the strange addictions explored in each episode are everything from an obsession with a blow dryer, to another eating toilet paper, to spending time with a silicone person, to eating detergent, to extreme body building, and to thumb sucking, you will see it all on My Strange Addiction.

videos.title: Raw Meat, Snorting Food, Being Huge

metas.name: Expedition X
metas.description: In Expedition X, Josh Gates joined by scientist Phil Torres and paranormal researcher Heather Amaro to investigate reports of supernatural encounters, mysterious creatures, and astonishing extraterrestrial phenomena. Whether trekking through the remote jungles of Cambodia in search of a legendary ape-man or exploring the secrets of the world's largest cave system right here in the United States, the Expedition X team is taking viewers to the stranger side of the unknown.Making her debut in Expedition X Season 8 is third-generation paranormal investigator Heather Amaro. Amaro notably replaced former host Jessica Chobot, who was one of the main stars of Expedition X for its first seven seasons.

metas.name: Tyler Perry's Sistas
metas.description: A group of single black women from different walks of life navigate their complicated love life status, careers and friendship through the ups-and-downs of living in a modern world of social media and unrealistic relationship goals.

metas.name: Body Cam
metas.description: Body Cam gives viewers their own eyewitness look at the life-or-death instant decisions of policework, as told by officers' own body camera footage. Offering an immersive portrayal of life on the streets, Body Cam engages a unique storytelling technique combining the body camera footage with first-hand accounts to virtually place viewers in harrowing moments as the suspense builds and the tension rises. Each episode tells multiple stories of those who vowed to protect and serve in unflinching detail, offering viewers their own personal perspective of officers in life-threatening circumstances. From domestic disputes to ambushes and traffic stops gone dangerously awry, Body Cam profiles just how quickly seemingly routine situations can escalate into tragic altercations.

metas.name: Southern Charm
metas.description: Southern Charm goes behind the walls of Charleston, South Carolina's most aristocratic families to reveal a world of exclusivity, money and scandal that goes back generations. The fast-paced, drama-filled docu-series follows six Charleston singles — Craig Conover, Cameran Eubanks, Jenna King, Thomas Ravenel, Shepard "Shep" Rose, and Whitney Sudler Smith — struggling with the constraints of this tight-knit, posh society. The cast, some descendants of Vice Presidents and four-term Senators, and others from "new money," is comprised of Southern bachelors who suffer from "Peter Pan Syndrome" by refusing to settle down; and the women in their lives who challenge them to grow up. Viewers will see them launch political careers, build businesses, break hearts, and chase true love -- all while struggling to preserve their family names. Because in Charleston, you're only as good as your last garden party and one social screw-up can taint generations to come.

metas.name: The Price is Right at Night
metas.description: An audience full of previous contestants who had heart-wrenching losses get a second chance to win big; prizes include a trip to a private island in Belize, a 14-day cruise to Antarctica, a sailboat, new car, cash prizes and a home theater set.

videos.title: Dream Car
videos.overview: Hosted by Drew Carey, lucky contestants play iconic pricing games, including Let 'Em Roll, Any Number and That's Too Much, for a shot at driving home their dream luxury automobiles.

metas.name: Ozark Law
metas.description: For nine months of the year, the peaceful towns around central Missouri's Lake of the Ozarks are home to just a few thousand residents. However, when summer arrives, millions of tourists flock to the area, seeking fun on the water and vibrant nightlife in the bars. This surge transforms the serene environment into a bustling hub, putting extra pressure on local law enforcement. In this new 10-episode series, viewers join the Lake Ozark Police Department and Osage Beach Police Department on their daily patrols, witnessing firsthand the challenges they face in maintaining order and ensuring safety in this lively midwestern destination.

videos.title: Welcome Back to the Lake
videos.overview: The new summer at Lake of the Ozarks kicks off with a Memorial Day weekend of "star-spangled awesome" as officers battle barroom brawlers and hotboxing drivers.

metas.name: Neighborhood Watch
metas.description: Neighborhood Watch, revealing the raw, unfiltered and sometimes shocking footage straight from security cameras, smart doorbells, nanny cams and baby monitors across America. From neighbors and postal workers to uninvited guests and animal visitors, the network will tap into the hilarious, outrageous and downright bizarre moments caught on home surveillance video.

videos.title: Well, That Didn't Go As Planned
videos.overview: Each day we assume life will go along just as we planned, until it suddenly and comically doesn't. Unanticipated failures, schemes going sideways, good intentions gone wrong — life is most entertaining when nothing goes according to plan.

metas.name: Pawn Stars
metas.description: Long before banks, ATMS and check-cashing services, there were pawn shops. Pawning was the leading form of consumer credit in the United States until the 1950s, and pawn shops are still helping everyday people make ends meet. Pawn Stars takes you inside the colorful world of the pawn business. At the Gold & Silver Pawn Shop on the outskirts of Las Vegas, three generations of the Harrison family - grandfather Richard, son Rick and grandson Corey - jointly run the family business, and there's clashing and camaraderie every step of the way. The three men use their sharp eyes and skills to assess the value of items from the commonplace to the truly historic, including a 16th-century samurai sword, a Super Bowl ring, a Picasso painting and a 17th-century stay of execution. It's up to them to determine what's real and what's fake, as they reveal the often surprising answer to the questions on everyone's mind, "What's the story behind it?" and "What's it worth?"

videos.title: Where the Wild Things Pawn
videos.overview: Rick can't help falling in love with a "Viva Las Vegas" movie poster from France. Is this deal fit for a king, or will the poster leave the building? Then, a customer brings in some prototype figures from "Where the Wild Things Are."

videos.title: A Gold and Silver Ticket
videos.overview: Rick hopes for a golden ticket when a seller brings in a rare golden Willy Wonka Funko Pop! Will he find an Everlasting offer, or will the deal leave him feeling bluer than Violet Beauregarde?

metas.name: Shark Tank
metas.description: Shark Tank is an American reality television series where entrepreneurs pitch their business ideas to a panel of wealthy investors, known as "Sharks," who risk their own money to invest in promising ventures in exchange for equity. The show follows aspiring entrepreneurs as they present their products or services to the Sharks, who critically evaluate the businesses and can either make a deal or pass, leading to either success or a potentially rejected venture.

videos.title: Urine for a Surprise: Would NFL Legend Michael Strahan Use This Personal Product in Public?
5 Sharks and a Baby: Can This New Invention Provide Sleep for Newborns and Their Parents?

metas.name: Chicago P.D.
metas.description: District 21 of the Chicago Police Department is made up of two distinctly different groups. There are the uniformed cops who patrol the beat and go head to head with the city's street crimes. And there's the Intelligence Unit, the team that combats the city's major offenses - organized crime, drug trafficking, high profile murders and beyond. These are their stories.

videos.title: Born Screaming
videos.overview: Voight and the team work together to uncover the truth of the Bell case before more lives are lost.

videos.title: Heroes
videos.overview: Platt finds herself challenged when a simple favor for a former recruit spirals into something far more devastating.

metas.name: Expedition Files
metas.description: In the all-new series Expedition Files, adventurer Josh Gates travels through history on a search to uncover new evidence and answers to the world's most captivating and unexplained mysteries.  Each episode of Expedition Files explores compelling true stories that defy explanation, offering stunning revelations and surprising new insights.

metas.name: To Catch a Smuggler: South Pacific
metas.description: Customs officers fight against drug smuggling at airports, air cargo inspection facilities and the international mail center.

metas.name: The Murder Tapes
metas.description: Homicide investigations unfold through dramatic real video footage in this groundbreaking new series. This series provides an up-close perspective on homicide investigations, incorporating bodycam footage from the initial crime scene, surveillance video, and interrogation room recordings. This footage is interwoven with present-day interviews from those directly involved in the investigation. The Murder Tapes uses every conceivable form of authentic video available, sharing up-close perspectives in a raw and unfiltered form. Viewers see and hear first impressions from officers to show exactly how theories begin to arise, heart-pounding confessionals inside the interrogation room, and from loved ones in real time.

videos.title: Between Friends
videos.overview: After a car crashes, police called to the scene must investigate the shooting of three of its occupants.

metas.name: Desert Law
metas.description: When the blistering Arizona sun finally sets over Tucson's Sonoran Desert, the temperature drops—and the crime rises. With elite access to the Pima County Sheriff's Department serving the seventh-largest county in the nation, "Desert Law" follows the high-intensity work of its patrol deputies, DUI unit, and night detectives as they cover more than 9,000 square miles of unforgiving rugged terrain. Taking on the trouble that thrives after dark, the series immerses viewers in the pressure and danger of policing the desert night, capturing a world where the spirit of the Old West still lingers and the fight for order never ends.

videos.title: Welcome to Pima County
videos.overview: In scorching Pima County, AZ, when the sun goes down, crime goes up and the Sheriff's Department must fight to keep the peace. Detective McLeod races after a hit and run driver and Deputy Stewart has surprising encounters with couples in parked cars.

metas.name: Grand Designs Transformations
metas.description: Australia's boldest and most inspired home renovators put their skills, finances and relationships to the test in the quest to create their perfect homes.

videos.title: Teneriffe Tree House and Dubbo Garden

metas.name: TopKnotz
metas.description: TopKnotz is an adrenaline-fuelled power trip across the waters of the South Pacific hosted by an all-star lineup including: Gold Logie winner Grant Denyer, culinary expert Miguel Maestre, professional surfer Felicity Palmateer, veteran stuntman Rob Palmer, and seasoned presenter Tom Williams.This new series follows the five fearless hosts as they dive headfirst into the world of marine leisure, tackle extreme challenges and wild stunts, and encounter hilarious mishaps along the way.

metas.name: Aussie Lobster Men
metas.description: Aussie Lobster Men follows the real life dramas of six lobster boat captains over the last ten weeks of the winter rock lobster hunting season as they risk it all in search of the world's most prized seafood delicacy. For the lobstermen, it's their last chance to put money in the bank until the fishing grounds re-open in spring. The Southern Ocean is Australia's deadliest stretch of ocean. Against a backdrop of wild weather and treacherous seas, crews work night and day to haul in hundreds of kilograms of lobsters across slippery decks. Even a minor problem can turn deadly in a matter of moments and the nearest port is often hundreds of nautical miles away.

metas.name: Telly Bingo
metas.description: Telly Bingo is an Irish National Lottery draw that works like a traditional game of bingo, with a full house prize of €10,000 and the opportunity to win much more if you complete your card on or before the Snowball number is drawn. Telly Bingo was launched in 1999 and ticket holders watch the game take place every Tuesday, Thursday and Friday on television channel RTÉ One.

metas.name: Ear to the Ground
metas.description: Ear to the Ground, RTÉ's longest running factual series offers a fresh, new look at how rural Ireland is changing.

metas.name: Spain with Michael Portillo
metas.description: Michael Portillo takes us on a journey deep into his Secret Spain.

videos.title: Asturias
videos.overview: Michael explores the rugged green region of Asturias on Spain's northern coast. His journey begins with an exhilarating drive in a vintage car, ascending the windy roads of the Cantabrian Mountains in search of a fiesta, where locals celebrate shepherds, whole barbecued lamb, bagpipes, and crown the Grandad and Granny of the year.

metas.name: GPs: Behind Closed Doors
metas.description: GPs: Behind Closed Doors is a fascinating observational documentary series that takes viewers into the private world of a local GP surgery.

videos.title: Episode 13
videos.overview: A 53-year-old former typist Cherie arrives at the practice with a painfully swollen hand. Dr Libby Pearson suspects arthritis, but an autoimmune condition could also be to blame. Mark seeks help for his ongoing stomach troubles and Dr George Hawche carries out a careful examination. Also, 76-year-old Corina meets Dr Libby about a rare skin condition that causes constant itching and blisters.

videos.title: Episode 14
videos.overview: Paula sees Dr Anna McKeogh about a worrying skin lesion on her leg, and after a careful examination, Dr Anna diagnoses it as pre-cancerous. Dr Matt Prestwich checks baby Noah's persistent cough, putting mum at ease. Dr Libby Pearson catches up with Peter, who's struggling with shoulder and back pain. Also, Alexander limps in to see Dr George Hawche after a motorbike accident in Vietnam.

metas.name: Lorraine Kelly's Norwegian Odyssey
metas.description: Lorraine Kelly traverses Norway's epic fjords, via majestic mountains and dramatic volcanic islands, embracing the local culture, food and traditions of her northern neighbours along the way.

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: Lorraine starts her epic coastal journey in Alesund, the gateway to the fjords, before sailing through the Hjorundfjord. She visits the tiny settlements on its banks, hikes the jagged mountains of the Sunnmore Alps and meets local people who've chosen a timeless, rural life that reminds her of islands back in Scotland. Learning of Friluftsliv, the concept of living in and embracing nature, she enjoys a dip in the chilly waters, before warming up in one of the region's many floating saunas. She then sails through the night to Trondheim, a foodie capital that used to be Norway's Viking capital. Learning about the city's fascinating history while kayaking down its famous River Nid, Lorraine arrives at one of its cutting-edge restaurants to help cook up a feast from ingredients foraged from nearby beaches and woodlands.

metas.name: Fair City
metas.description: The day-to-day dramas of the community who live and work in the fictional north Dublin suburb of Carrigstown.

videos.title: Tue 6th Jan 2026
videos.overview: As Paul continues to maintain his innocence, Orla knows she has to force him to confront the truth and, with things remaining tense, Ali questions what Carol wants from her relationship with JJ. Jess's fears are confirmed when Steo abandons Taylor when he's meant to be on dad duty. Holly realises that Ian has been spreading gossip about her Sugar Baby past.

videos.title: Thu 8th Jan 2026
videos.overview: Steo's actions come between Carol and JJ and Paul's back is against the wall. Jess breaks bad news to Steo about his legal case. Ian's continued harassment of Holly spurs Greg to act.

videos.title: Fri 9th Jan 2026
videos.overview: With Kev on the run and depending on Paul, Orla advises Paul how to deal with the escalating situation. After Ian's targeting of Holly , Greg finds himself in line for promotion. Emma proves an unlikely nurse when Tommy gets injured and Sharon is not pleased by Jacinta's interference.

videos.title: Sun 11th Jan 2026
videos.overview: As Kev blackmails him, Paul is left to deal with it alone. Greg gets a huge opportunity to prove himself, but a scheming Ian has other plans.

videos.title: Tue 13th Jan 2026
videos.overview: When his drastic action against Kev fails, Paul is forced to involve JJ . Once again outwitted by Ian, Greg begins to put it together that his drinks were spiked.

videos.title: Thu 15th Jan 2026
videos.overview: Sharon can't convince Jacinta that the blame for the tacky donations is all Gwen's. Paul is going through the wringer, and Carol sympathises, but J.J is finished with him.

metas.name: Forensics: Catching the Killer
metas.description: True crime series exploring horrific murders and the part forensic science played in finding the killers.

videos.title: The Double Jeopardy Killer
videos.overview: How, in 1995, Vikki left her home to take the dog for a walk. Later, the dog returned home alone, signaling that something was terribly wrong.

videos.title: Unlocking The Truth
videos.overview: In 1998, 22-year-old Jenny went out, looking forward to an evening with friends. This edition looks at how that night would ended in tragedy, as she never returned home.

metas.name: Long Lost Family
metas.description: Long Lost Family traces & reunites family members, delivering some of the most emotionally powerful scenes ever seen on television.

videos.title: Episode 5
videos.overview: Alan Parker's painful last memory of his mother is of her leaving the family home when he was five - the reason she left and what happened to her afterwards remain a mystery that Alan's desperate to solve. In the second case, seven-year-old Katherine Fletcher was told that she was adopted and felt an immediate sense of shame - although unfounded, that shame fuelled a desire to find her birth mother that has only intensified as the years have passed.

metas.name: Ben Fogle: New Lives in the Wild
metas.description: Adventurer Ben Fogle gets a taste of extreme escapism in this brand new series meeting those who have turned their backs on the daily grind. Each week, Ben spends time in one of the world's most remote locations, meeting the people who now inhabit these inhospitable corners of the planet after leaving their ordinary lives behind. Our intrepid guide also wonders whether these extraordinary individuals and their incredible experiences might tempt him to move his own family out of London and away from the comforts of the city. Is it daring or downright crazy? Ben wants to discover the truth about life in tough, harsh conditions, where doing battle with Mother Nature is a daily reality.

videos.title: Uganda
videos.overview: Ben visits former war journalist Alison Porteous, to find out what took his host from a career reporting on the front line to life on a remote island on Lake Victoria. He learns of the events that bind Ali to Uganda's violent past and discovers how her beautiful home is helping heal her own wounds.

metas.name: Britain's Favourite Railway Stations
metas.description: Britain's Favourite Railway Stations will see Si explore stunning examples of the nation's engineering and architecture as he disembarks at some of the country's most eclectic train stations.Alongside two experts, transport historian Siddy Holloway and architect Damion Burrows, Si will learn why these utilitarian buildings are so special as each episode tells a story of British history, industry and community. The series will follow Si as he discovers the structural feats that everyday commuters might miss. From city to coast, where the waves crash just metres away, the TV star will find out surprising and revelatory facts as he calls into each station.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: Si fulfils a lifelong dream on the Snowdon Mountain Railway, uncovering its Victorian origins, daring engineering and iconic summit station loved by generations of visitors. Plus, the Keighley and Worth Valley Railway, which was once used by the Brontë sisters, and a breathtaking architectural gateway to Scotland's Clyde coast that remains a destination in its own right.

metas.name: Rob and Romesh Vs...
metas.description: Rob Beckett and Romesh Ranganathan are putting their friendship to the test as they travel the world to meet a host of international superstars. They are on a mission to immerse themselves in these stars' worlds as they attempt to get a glimpse into their extraordinary lives, follow in their footsteps and find out what makes them who they are. Will their friendship last the journey?

videos.title: Team GB: Winter Special (Part 1)
videos.overview: The duo try their hands at winter sports, with help from former ski-jumper Eddie 'the Eagle' Edwards and 2022 Olympic curling champion Eve Muirhead. They take on everything from bobsled to biathlon, skiing and curling in a journey that takes them across the world, from St Moritz in Switzerland to the World Curling Championships in Fredericton, Canada.

metas.name: When Death Comes Knocking
metas.description: In When Death Comes Knocking, each episode follows a homicide investigation where crucial evidence was caught on a Ring-style doorbell or home security footage.

videos.title: TBA
videos.overview: Each episode of this true crime series follows a homicide investigation where crucial evidence was caught on a Ring-style doorbell or home security footage.

metas.name: Fíorscéal
metas.description: Fíorscéal - a documentary series covering stories from around the globe, with topics ranging from climate change to human evolution and everything in-between.

videos.title: Big Dope - Addiction Criminals
videos.overview: Documentary looking at the opioid epidemic in the USA and all over the world. This story is told by the very perpetrators and blurs the lines between global pharma and crime networks, a story of a toxic business that has killed 800,000 Americans and has been slowly spreading worldwide.

metas.name: Dragons' Den
metas.description: Dragons' Den, an original CBC Production and audience favourite, returns to delight viewers for a new season.Aspiring entrepreneurs from across Canada vie for a coveted spot in the Den to pitch potentially profitable business investments to some of the nation's most successful tycoons. The Dragons use their own money and know-how and have the power to catapult companies into home-grown business success stories.Every episode theatre and venture capital collide. Stakes are high as good deals may be rewarded, but there's also the risk that bad ideas will get burned. Dragons' Den offers the audience a front-row view as the country's top business moguls wheel and deal with entrepreneurs who dare to brave the Den.

videos.title: Episode 11
videos.overview: Friends from Toronto hope their app helps them find a partner in the Den; co-founders from Edmonton press the Dragons for a deal.

videos.title: Episode 12
videos.overview: In this episode, a family from Northbrook, ON, hope the Dragons will soften to their skincare line, a Calgary entrepreneur looks to shed light on a safety issue, and an entrepreneur from Toronto seeks a plush investment. Plus, an entrepreneur from Montreal looks to give the Dragons a comfy seat at his cap table.

metas.name: Monty Don's Rhineland Gardens
metas.description: From the Alps to the North Sea, flowing through big cities, dramatic landscapes and romantic valleys - Monty explores extraordinary gardens shaped by the mighty River Rhine.

videos.title: Episode 3
videos.overview: Monty ends this series in the Netherlands, where the Rhine becomes a network of waterways. He visits the biggest display of tulips in the world and the busiest flower market.

metas.name: Cat's Eye
metas.description: Working at the café by day, three sisters lead a double life as Cat's Eye, the elusive art thieves.

metas.name: Can This Love Be Translated?
metas.description: The emotions of a celebrity and her interpreter get lost in translation as they travel the world filming a TV show. Will love find its own language?

metas.name: Gladiators: Epic Pranks
metas.description: Secret Prankster Nitro enlists the help of his teammates as they aim to pull off some epic pranks on their fellow competitors: will Bionic wear a bunny costume at a calendar shoot for April? Will Viper fall for a fake influencer's demands? And behind the scenes at the live Gladiators shows in Sheffield, there are even pranks on unsuspecting members of the public, as well as the Gladiators going head-to-head in games like Rock, Paper, Scissors, and Charades. And yes, of course they are just as competitive outside the Arena as they are in it!

metas.name: Jasmine
metas.description: Jasmine works as an escort to provide a better life for her and her stepbrother Tufan – and bribe her way onto the heart transplant list.

videos.title: 5. Bölüm
videos.overview: As Tufan runs for his life, Jasmine confronts losing everything.

metas.name: What Drives You with John Cena
metas.description: John Cena is known for his award-winning performances in the ring and on the big screen, but now this global icon is ready to give audiences a front row seat to his two biggest passions: cars and connecting with people. What Drives You is a breakthrough talk format where John will spend time with the most successful celebrities on the planet and talk about what drives them—both on the road and in their hearts.

metas.name: Project Runway Canada
metas.description: Project Runway Canada, the Canadian adaptation of the globally renowned fashion competition series, sees aspiring designers cut and sew their way through a series of intense challenges, hoping to prove to a panel of industry icons that they deserve their big break in fashion — and the title of Canada's next great designer.

videos.title: Road to Finale (Hometowns & Final Preparations)
videos.overview: With the finale fast approaching, mentor Aurora James visits each finalist's hometown for a personal look at their lives and collections.

metas.name: Blue Peter
metas.description: Join Abby, Joel, Shini, Hacker T Dog and pet Henry on epic challenges and exciting adventures as we inspire you to try awesome new activities and earn your Blue Peter badge.

videos.title: Best of 2025
videos.overview: Get ready for the best bits of an epic year on Blue Peter! We look back at some of our favourite moments – from Joel saddling up as a rancher in Canada and Abby discovering real dinosaur footprints on the Isle of Skye, to Shini encountering tigers in the wild in India and brand new presenter Hacker T Dog officially joining the show.

metas.name: Phineas and Ferb
metas.description: Phineas and Ferb are Phineas Flynn and his stepbrother, Ferb Fletcher who are determined to make every day of their summer vacation fun. They try building a full-scale roller coaster, becoming musicians, building a backyard beach, and traveling back in time to meet dinosaurs. Their family pet, Perry the Platypus, doubles as a secret agent and battles evil. Meanwhile, older sister Candace is tattling on them to Mom and Dad, though she can never seem to catch them in the act.

metas.name: Niebo. Rok w piekle
metas.description: A psychological drama transformed into a thriller inspired by true events. Set in the early 1990s, the story follows a young, idealistic boy who abandons his studies and joins a religious sect.

metas.name: SuperKitties
metas.description: Set in the city of Kittydale, each SuperKitties episode features two stories as the four kittens, cuddled up at the Purr 'N' Play playspace or out playing around town, receive a "SuperKitty Call" from one of their animal friends with a problem that only the SuperKitties can help with, usually caused by one of the comedic villains in the series: Cat Burglar, Mr. Puppypaws, Lab Rat or Zsa-Zsa. With plenty of super skills and gadgets at their disposal, the SuperKitties set off to thwart the villains' plans and impart important messages along the way.

metas.name: Would I Lie to You?
metas.description: A comedic panel show featuring team captains Lee Mack and David Mitchell plus two guests per side, hosted by Rob Brydon (formerly Angus Deayton). Each person must reveal embarrassing facts and outrageous lies during a series of different rounds including "Ring of Truth", "This is My..." and "Quickfire Lies". It is up to the opposing team to tell tall tales from fantastic facts.

videos.title: Bob Mortimer, Dianne Buswell, Jamelia, Mark Chapman
videos.overview: Rob Brydon hosts the award-winning comedy panel show. Team captains Lee Mack and David Mitchell are joined by guest panellists Bob Mortimer, Dianne Buswell, Jamelia and Mark Chapman.

metas.name: Tom Read Wilson's Magnificent Journey
metas.description: Tom Read Wilson's Magnificent Journey reimagines the rite of passage once undertaken by 17th, 18th and 19th-century aristocrats on their Grand Tours of Europe. Now, nearly 40 and craving a touch of cultural enlightenment, Tom Read Wilson sets out to follow in their footsteps. With a heart full of wanderlust and a taste for timeless beauty, Tom embarks on his own Grand Tour, armed with his Super 8 camera and travelling from Paris to Rome to become schooled in art & architecture and enriched in history and culture. It's a series brimming with beauty, wit, and the enduring joy of lifelong learning.

videos.title: Episode 3
videos.overview: Leaving behind the indulgent revelry of the Venice Carnival, Tom embarks on a scenic journey through Tuscany in a vintage Lancia, arriving in the cradle of the Renaissance - Florence. This city, long a magnet for Grand Tourists, enchants with its artistic splendour and architectural majesty. The sight of Filippo Brunelleschi's magnificent Dome leaves Tom awe-struck. Guided by his ever-knowledgeable tutor, or "bear leader," he stands before Michelangelo's iconic David and gains rare, private access to the Uffizi Gallery. There, he marvels at one of its crowning jewels - Botticelli's 'The Birth of Venus'.Inspired by the greats, Tom visits master sculptor Raffaello Romanelli to try his hand at shaping a clay bust, following in the footsteps of countless Grand Tourists who once came to Florence to study art, architecture, and sculpture in this romantic, cultural haven.Tom's journey then leads him to Rome, the pinnacle of the Grand Tour. With its layers of ancient history and vibrant artistic life, the Eternal City was a place where British travellers often lingered for months, even years. At the historic Caffè Greco - a gathering spot for thinkers and artists - Tom learns that just across the street lies the Keats-Shelley House, the final home of the romantic poet John Keats.In true Grand Tourist fashion, Tom commissions a portrait - not the flattering ideal often painted by local artists, but a revealing portrayal of his true self, with striking results. As his time in Rome draws to a close, he embraces its timeless romance, joining street musicians to serenade passing lovers - and as his voice rises, hearts melt.The Grand Tour was meant to transform its participants, to broaden horizons and deepen the soul. Reflecting on his own odyssey through Europe, Tom wonders: how has he changed, and what has he discovered on his very own journey?

metas.name: David Baddiel: Cat Man
metas.description: David Baddiel hosts the purr-fect combo of kitty cuteness, cat calamity and feline fun, featuring pawesome viral sensations and some famous cat-loving faces.

videos.title: Episode 2
videos.overview: The comedian, writer and lifelong cat devotee continues his nationwide journey to meet extraordinary cats and their equally passionate owners. In this episode, he meets the so-called ugliest cat on the internet and some remarkable rescue moggies, and dips his toe into the world of cat shows.

metas.name: Jane McDonald: From Pole to Pole
metas.description: Jane says she's "a woman of a certain age" but in this series she's determined not to let that define her. And she's proving it by throwing herself into her Pole to Pole adventure and grabbing every opportunity with both hands.

videos.title: Episode 4
videos.overview: For the first time on Jane's epic journey, she's visiting more traditional tourist hotspots.First up is a guided jeep tour of beautiful Ilha Bela, where she witnesses the strange phenomena of singing rocks. Sailing along the Costa Verde coastline, Jane stops at exquisite Paraty, to explore the biodiverse Mangroves; a UNESCO world heritage site, by Kayak. Jane sails in to the beautiful bay of Buzios, known as the Saint Tropez of Brazil - made famous by Brigitte Bardot - and explores the peninsula on a tourist trolley bus, chatting to fellow yacht passengers about their favourite places so far.On the final leg of Jane's Brazilian adventure she takes a cable car to the top of Sugar Loaf mountain for panoramic views of Rio de Janeiro, and savours her final taste of Brazil at a mountain top bar.

metas.name: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
metas.description: Jimmy Carr hosts as Sean Lock and Jon Richardson play the words and numbers game.

videos.title: Lucy Beaumont, Rob Brydon, Joe Wilkinson, Huge Davies
videos.overview: Jimmy Carr hosts, inviting Jon Richardson and Lucy Beaumont to compete against Rob Brydon and Joe Wilkinson. Regular Countdown mathematician Rachel Riley and lexicographer Susie Dent are on hand to adjudicate, while Huge Davies joins Susie in Dictionary Corner.

metas.name: Taskmasterclass
metas.description: It's the weirdest and most wonderful competition on television. But is there method behind Taskmaster's madness? Greg Davies and Little Alex Horne reveal all, with the help of some willing victims.

videos.title: The State of Comedy
videos.overview: Greg Davies and Alex Horne examine the state of comedy in modern-day Britain using highlights from Taskmaster. Clips include Romesh Ranganathan sitting in a tree, Mel Giedroyc performing classic slapstick, John Kearns struggling through a series of chutes and Desiree Burch throwing a bucket of forks at a balloon.

metas.name: The Loud House
metas.description: Welcome to the Loud House, where life can get pretty crazy. One boy, TEN girls?! Lincoln Loud wouldn't change it for the world!

videos.title: Meet the Purrents
videos.overview: When Lori and Bobby find a kitten, they decide to coparent and swap the kitten back and forth between their homes.

videos.title: Apartment Complex
videos.overview: After telling her family how great her apartment is, Lori unknowingly entices her sisters to secretly take over her space.

metas.name: Wylde Pak
metas.description: Wylde Pak follows half-siblings Jack and Lily as they are pushed outside their comfort zones and learn to coexist while navigating new family dynamics, friends, and endless hijinks, all while helping run the family's pet grooming and boarding business. With guidance from their parents and grandmother, the two will learn about each other's previously separate lives, blended identity, vibrant culture, and the importance of family.

videos.title: Basic Zipper Merging Etiquette
videos.overview: The family gets stuck in a traffic jam that leads to all human civility getting thrown out the passenger side window.

videos.title: How to Bag a Beast
videos.overview: Jack and Lily attempt to catch a legendary town fish despite horror stories from townsfolk who have tried and failed before them.

metas.name: Crime Beat
metas.description: Crime Beat is a true crime series that takes viewers deep into some of Canada's most infamous criminal cases. Hosted by Antony Robart and based on the highly successful podcast by Nancy Hixt, Crime Beat showcases some of the best investigative crime reporting from the Global News reporters who covered the stories in real time. Using extensive archives, intimate family interviews, each week Crime Beat reveals new details that go beyond the news headlines: giving a voice to victims and their families, unraveling how each case was solved through the eyes of the detectives and forensic specialists, and exploring lasting impacts on the community and justice system.

metas.name: Celebrity Wheel of Fortune
metas.description: Celebrity Wheel of Fortune welcomes celebrity contestants to come spin the world's most famous wheel and solve word puzzles for a chance to win up to one million dollars. All of the money won by the celebrity contestants will go to a charity of their choice.

videos.title: Max Greenfield, D'Arcy Carden and Timothy Simons
videos.overview: Celebrity contestants Max Greenfield, D'Arcy Carden and Timothy Simons.

metas.name: Happy's Place
metas.description: Happy's Place follows Bobbie who inherits her father's restaurant and is less than thrilled to discover that she has a new business partner in the half-sister she never knew she had.

videos.title: Izzy and the Professor
videos.overview: When Isabella starts dating again, Bobbie can't wait to meet her new man until she learns Isabella is dating her professor. Gabby and Steve obsess over a lost phone Takoda finds in the men's room.

metas.name: Power Book IV: Force
metas.description: Tommy Egan cuts all ties and puts New York in his rearview mirror for good when he arrives in Chicago and sets his sights on becoming the biggest drug dealer the Second City has ever seen.

videos.title: War Requiem
videos.overview: Revenge, new alliances and dangerous secrets collide, leaving everyone to fight dirty in a game with deadly consequences.

metas.name: Ready to Love
metas.description: Ready to Love explores the real-life dating interactions of sexy, successful and grown black men and women in their 30s and 40s who are each looking for lasting love and an authentic relationship. A unique twist on a typical dating show, Ready to Love highlights the men's observations and experiences in the search for true love in Atlanta.

videos.title: Detroit Getaway Part 2
videos.overview: A trip can make you fall in love or fall on your face! Steven has multiple blunders, Ashante questions her connection with Bello, and Vince tries to right things with Lauren.  Dom gets pissed when one woman talks about her without saying her name.

metas.name: RuPaul's Drag Race
metas.description: RuPaul's Drag Race is a Primetime Emmy Award winning American reality competition television series, hosted by five time Emmy Award Winning Host and international Drag superstar RuPaul. The show features drag queen contestants competing in weekly challenges such as photo shoots, comedy performances and stomping the runway in the hopes of avoiding the bottom two - where they will have to lip sync for their lives.

videos.title: Q-Pop Girl Groups
videos.overview: The queens sing and dance in rival "Q-Pop" girl groups: the "Q" standing for quintessentially queer, with tracks inspired by Sylvester, Wham! and The Runaways. Actress and singer Dove Cameron guest judges.

metas.name: Gold Rush
metas.description: Gold Rush follows six men who, in the face of an economic meltdown, risk everything - their families, their dignity, and in some cases, their lives - to strike it rich mining for gold in the wilds of Alaska. Inspired by his father Jack, Todd Hoffman of Sandy, Oregon, leads a group of greenhorn miners to forge a new frontier and save their families from dire straits. While leasing a gold claim in Alaska, Todd and his company of newbies face the grandeur of Alaska as well as its hardships, including an impending winter that will halt operations and the opportunity to strike gold. In an effort to keep the operation running, the team takes fate into their own hands with a make or break venture that will change their lives forever.

videos.title: Playing With Fire
videos.overview: Forest fires threaten to shut down Parker's Sulphur Creek claim before he can get all the gold out. Rick decides whether to move back to Duncan Creek. Tony loses nearly $750,000 in gold fighting a wash plant issue.

videos.title: When Parker Met Rick
videos.overview: Rick Ness takes a job working on 16-year-old Parker Schnabel's gold mine. The two miners form a strong bond, bringing in millions in gold -- but a falling-out changes everything.

metas.name: On Patrol: First Shift
metas.description: On Patrol: Live's Dan Abrams, Sean "Sticks" Larkin, and Curtis Wilson provide a sneak peek at tonight's On Patrol: Live and share favorite moments from previous programs.

metas.name: Love During Lockup
metas.description: Love During Lockup follows even more riveting firsts through the early stages of love, with plenty of romance, suspicion, and investigation, all long before a scheduled prison release. Every non-con has a unique strategy for finding love behind bars - whether they only seek drug offenders who are believed to be nonviolent, or a prison bae pushing a wrongful conviction. Other lonely civilians are simply on the hunt for their very own 'hot felon,' with the model mugshot to prove it. Voracious viewers of the franchise are in for more drama, more mystery, scams, catfishing, and more crazy reveals than ever before. Love During Lockup will document the fascinating drama that unfolds when ordinary people first decide to pursue relationships with prison inmates, and an early dating period filled with a very specific set of unique challenges.

metas.name: My Lottery Dream Home
metas.description: David Bromstad takes recent lottery winners on over-the-top house hunts for their new dream homes. Whether they win hundreds of thousands or hundreds of millions, lucky lottery winners everywhere are jumping headfirst into the real estate market. Will they spend all their winnings on an extravagant mansion or settle for a humble sound investment? Find out what happens when average Americans set out to find My Lottery Dream Home.

metas.name: Triple D Nation
metas.description: For the first time Guy Fieri is heading back to some of his all-time favorite Diners, Drive-ins and Dives spots on Triple D Nation. On this all-new spin on DDD, Guy checks in on some of the most memorable joints he has previously visited to see how they have been doing, and to get a taste of some of the new and classic recipes they are dishing out. Whether they have opened new locations, expanded their old ones, or added to their menus, these restaurants are always pushing the boundaries of their culinary comfort zone.

metas.name: The UnXplained
metas.description: The UnXplained will tackle subjects that have mystified mankind for centuries, from mysterious structures and cursed ancient cities to extraterrestrial sightings and bizarre rituals. The series will also feature contributions from top scientists, historians, engineers and researchers - each seeking to shed light on how the seemingly impossible can happen.

videos.title: Mysteries of the Underground
videos.overview: Beneath our feet lie hidden ancient tunnels, sacred caves, and shadowy passages into a world of darkness shaped by nature, carved by man, and steeped in myth. Are these underground realms mere remnants of the past?

metas.name: Masters of Illusion
metas.description: In Masters of Illusion, the world's greatest magicians and illusionists perform magic in front of a live studio audience. There are no camera or computer tricks involved and you'll see tricks such as women turning into tigers, birds appearing from nowhere and sleight of hands in the blink of an eye! From one amazing trick to another, the performances are shown to you non-stop in a spectacular show filled with reality-twisting, mind-blowing magic.

videos.title: Blades, Fire, and Random Risks
videos.overview: Featured magicians include Adam Wylie, Ed Alonzo, Scott Pepper, My Uyên, Jeki Yoo, Joel Meyers, Eric Eaton, Ivan Amodei, Trino, David Goldrake, Eric Jones and Jarol Martin.

metas.name: On Patrol: Live
metas.description: Hosting and executive producing On Patrol: Live is Dan Abrams, CEO and Founder of Abrams Media, host of Dan Abrams Live on NewsNation, Chief Legal Analyst for ABC News, and former host of Live PD. Joining Abrams is Sgt. Sean "Sticks" Larkin, retired Tulsa Police Department lieutenant with nearly 25 years of service, and Deputy Sheriff Curtis Wilson, Division Commander with the Richland County Sheriff's Department in Columbia, SC.

metas.name: RuPaul's Drag Race: Untucked!
metas.description: Get all the behind-the-scenes drama, tears and laughter of RuPaul's Drag Race as the queens anxiously await their fates backstage every week after the runway critiques.

videos.title: Q-Pop Girl Groups
videos.overview: The mood is darker in the Untucked Lounge after a shocker on the main stage. The divas try to uplift each other with a game of Truth or Dare. Sisterhood blooms in the Queen Cam booth.

metas.name: Junk or Jackpot?
metas.description: The show follows collectors as they discover the true monetary value of their massive and unusual collections. From an overwhelming stash of superhero figurines to cramped spaces stuffed with rare puppets and dolls and miniature sets that leave no room for actual, life-size furniture – these homes are begging for professional help, and the collectors must decide whether they are willing to sell some of their items to pay for the much-needed renovation. With a combination of humor, compassion and a celebration of the passionate collector in all of us, Bobby will support the homeowners through the process of sorting through, appraising and letting go of their stockpile, discovering the ‘found money' along the way to achieving their dream makeover.

videos.title: Welcome to the Doll House
videos.overview: Miniatures and dioramas have overrun the second floor of a woman's home. As a cancer survivor, she's enlisting Bobby's design help to transform her upstairs back into a place she can spend time with her grandkids.

metas.name: Monsterquest
metas.description: For centuries, people around the world have reported strange, and sometimes terrifying, encounters with what they describe as monsters. Now, for the first time, some of these witnesses are sharing their experiences. Each hour-long, themed episode of MonsterQuest unravels the mystery behind these chilling accounts. These extraordinary stories are brought to life like never before — challenging everything we think we know about the unknown.

metas.name: Casualty
metas.description: They're fighting to save patients while their personal lives are brimming with drama and intrigue. Everything's at stake on the emergency ward.

videos.title: Episode 1
videos.overview: It's the hottest day of the year, and the ED's two new resident doctors are put to the test. Dylan is spooked by his past, while Nicole is reminded of Ngozi.

metas.name: Prue Leith's Cotswold Kitchen
metas.description: Prue Leith opens the doors to her Cotswold Kitchen, sharing cherished recipes, tips, and handy culinary hacks.
